<!-- North America -->

<script type="text/javascript">
	
	  jQuery(document).ready(function(){
		  
		  jQuery('a[href^="https://www.upgrad.com/"]:not([href^="https://www.upgrad.com/us/"], [href^="https://www.upgrad.com/blog/"])').each(function(){ 
			  var usa = /(https?:\/\/)?([^:\/\s]+)((\/\w+)*\/)|((\/\us|gb|ae|sg|id|vn|za)*\/)([\w\-\.]+)(.*)?/i
               var oldUrl = jQuery(this).attr("href"); 
               var newUrl = oldUrl.replace(usa, "https://www.upgrad.com/us/"); 
                jQuery(this).attr("href", newUrl); 
            });
		  
	  });


</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
	
  jQuery(document).ready(function(){
	jQuery('a.postcustombtn').click(function() {
       jQuery('#footerForm').show();
    });
	  
	// Bottom tab close 
	jQuery('.book-close').click(function() {
	   var bottomcloseUrl = window.location.href;
       var bottomcloseTitle = document.getElementsByTagName("title")[0].innerHTML;

		analytics.track("modal_close_click", {
               devicetype: devicetype,
               platform_version: platform,
               upgrad_app_version: "NA",
               logged_in_flaf: "",
               screen_resolution: screenWH,
               phone_brand: "NA",
               page_url: bottomcloseUrl,
			   pageCategory: "blog_page",
			   page_category: "blog_page",
               program_package_key: "Blog-HomePage",
               page_title: bottomcloseTitle,
               Button_name: "BOTTOM TAB/open_form_submit",
        });

       jQuery('.upskilling-main').hide();    
    });
	  
	jQuery('.book-button').click(function() {
       jQuery('#myBooking').show();
	   jQuery('.upskilling-main').hide();
    });	

	  setTimeout(function() {
		  jQuery('#popForm').show();
	  }, 20000);
	  
	  

//     jQuery('.at-coursename').change(function() {

//         if(atcourse){
//             jQuery('.at-programs').show();
//         }else{
//             jQuery('.at-programs').hide();
//         }
//     });
	  
  });

</script>

		jQuery('#heroDownload2').hide();

		   devicetype: devicetype,
		   platform_version: platform,
		   upgrad_app_version: "NA",
		   logged_in_flaf: "",

		   phone_brand: "NA",

		   page_category: "blog_page",
		   program_package_key: "Blog-HomePage",

	   });
	   
	});

	function bottomBarRedirect($link){
		if($link == ''){
			$link = "https://www.upgrad.com/?autoSignup=true&autoSignupMessage=Enter%20your%20details%20to%20get%20a%20free%20and%20personalised%20counselling%20session&utm_source=BLOG&utm_campaign=BLOG_AS_EXP";
		}
		window.open($link, '_blank');
	}
	
	function validateEmail($email) {
	    var emailReg = /^([\w-\.]+@([\w-]+\.)+[\w-]{2,4})?$/;
	    return emailReg.test( $email );
	}

	function validateMobile($mobile) {
	    var mobileReg = /^((\+[1-9]{1,4}[ \-]*)|(\([0-9]{2,3}\)[ \-]*)|([0-9]{2,4})[ \-]*)*?[0-9]{3,4}?[ \-]*[0-9]{3,4}?$/;
	    return mobileReg.test( $mobile );
	}

	jQuery(window).on("load", function() {

		// jquery for filter drop-down
		jQuery( ".topicslist" ).selectmenu().selectmenu( "menuWidget" ).addClass( "overflow" );

		jQuery( ".sortfilter" ).selectmenu().selectmenu( "menuWidget" ).addClass( "overflow" );

		// social share icons tracking code 
		jQuery(".at-share-btn").each(function(){
			jQuery(this).addClass('social-analytic');
			var sociallabel = jQuery(this).find('.at4-visually-hidden').text();
			jQuery(this).attr("data-label-value", sociallabel);
		});

		jQuery('.social-analytic').on('click', function(){
			var socialVal = jQuery(this).data('label-value');
			ga('send', 'event', 'Social Media', 'click', socialVal);
		});
	});

	jQuery(document).ready(function(){

		// Right menu issue
	jQuery("ul.main-menu > li.menu-item-has-children > ul.sub-menu li.menu-item-has-children").on('mouseenter mouseleave', function (e) {
		if (jQuery('ul', this).length) {
			var elm = jQuery('ul:first', this);
			var off = elm.offset();
            var l = off.left;
            var bottom = jQuery(window).height() - off.top - elm.height();
            var w = elm.width();
			var hr = elm.height();
            var docH = jQuery("#page").height();
            var docW = jQuery("#page").width();

			console.log("Bottom: " + bottom);
			console.log("ELement: " + hr);
    
            var isEntirelyVisible = (l + w <= docW);
			var isHeight = (bottom < 50);
			
    
            if (!isEntirelyVisible) {
				jQuery(elm).css({"left": "auto", "right": "96%"});
            } else {
				jQuery(elm).css({"left": "96%", "right": "auto"});
            }

			if (!isHeight) {
				jQuery(elm).css({"top": "0", "bottom": "auto"});
            } else {
				jQuery(elm).css({"top": "auto", "bottom": "0"});
            }
        }
    });
		
// 	jQuery('ul#menu-main-menu > .menu-item-has-children > ul.sub-menu > .menu-item-has-children').on('mouseover', function (e) {
	
// 		var ulelem = jQuery('ul#menu-main-menu > li.menu-item-has-children > ul.sub-menu > li.menu-item-has-children > ul.sub-menu');
// 	var elmts = jQuery(ulelem, this);
//   var offs = elmts.offset();
//   var lefts = offs.left;
//   var elemwidth = elmts.width();
//   var docW = jQuery('#page').width();

//   var rightVisible = (lefts + elemwidth < docW);

//   if(!rightVisible){
// 	jQuery(elmts).css({"left": "auto", "right": "100%"});
//   } else{
//     jQuery(elmts).css({"left": "100%", "right": "auto"});
//   }

// });


		// jquery for category page filter
		var inProgress = true;
		jQuery(window).on('scroll', function() {
			if(jQuery('.posts-main-wr .homeportfolio-imageswr .wp-pagenavi').length > 0){
		    	if(inProgress){ 					
					if(isScrolledIntoView('.wp-pagenavi')) {
						var postCatId = jQuery('.homeportfolio-imageswr').attr('post-cat-id');
						var postTaxName = jQuery('.homeportfolio-imageswr').attr('post-tax-name');
						var nextPagerElement = jQuery('.posts-main-wr .homeportfolio-imageswr .wp-pagenavi .current').next();
			            var nextPagerFirstElement = nextPagerElement.text();
			            var nextnextPageNumber = nextPagerElement.next('a').text();
			            nextnextPageNumber = parseInt(nextnextPageNumber);
			            jQuery('.posts-main-wr .homeportfolio-imageswr .wp-pagenavi').find('a, span').removeClass('current');	
			            nextPagerFirstElement = parseInt(nextPagerFirstElement);	
                        nextPagerElement.addClass('current');				

	                    if(typeof nextPagerFirstElement == "number" && !isNaN(nextPagerFirstElement) ){	   			            	
			            	nextnextPageNumber = parseInt(nextnextPageNumber);
						 	inProgress = false;
				            jQuery.ajax({ 
								type: 'POST',
								url:'https://www.upgrad.com/blog/wp-admin/admin-ajax.php?action=filter_blog_posts',
								data: {"nextPagerFirstElement":nextPagerFirstElement, "postCatId":postCatId, "postTaxName":postTaxName},							
								success:function(response) {				
									jQuery('.wp-pagenavi').hide();													
									jQuery('.posts-main-wr .homeportfolio-imageswr').append(response); 
									jQuery(".posts-main-wr .homeportfolio-imageswr .element-item").each(function(i) {						
										jQuery(this).delay(150 * i).animate({
					                        'opacity': 1,
					                        'marginTop': 0
					                    }, 0);
									});
								}
							}).done(function(){
                                inProgress = true;
                            }); // end of ajax
				        } else {
                            jQuery('.wp-pagenavi').remove();
                        } 
			    	} // end of if
		    	} // end of if
	    	} // end of if
	    }); // end of scroll event

	    // function for jquery custom viewport 
		function isScrolledIntoView(elem) {
		    var docViewTop = jQuery(window).scrollTop();
		    var docViewBottom = docViewTop + jQuery(window).height();
		    var elemTop = jQuery(elem).offset().top;
		    var elemBottom = elemTop + jQuery(elem).height();
		    return ((elemBottom <= docViewBottom) && (elemTop >= docViewTop));
		}

		// jquery for category filter
		catID = 0;
		filterTopic = 0;
		var btndata;
		jQuery('.categorylist li a').click(function(){
			jQuery('.categorylist li a').removeClass('cat-active');
	   		jQuery(this).addClass('cat-active');            
			catID = jQuery(this).attr("data-filter-catid");
            jQuery(".element-item").css("opacity", "0.5");
			viewMore = '';
			pager = 1;
			calledAJAX(catID, filterTopic, viewMore, pager, pageSlug, btndata);
			target_url = jQuery(this).data('term-url');
            var stateObj = {};
            history.pushState(stateObj, "", target_url);
		});

		jQuery('body').on('selectmenuchange', '.topicslist', function(){
			jQuery(this).find('.filter-button').removeClass('cat-active');
            jQuery('.categorylist li a').removeClass('cat-active');
			jQuery(this).find('.filter-button:selected').addClass('cat-active'); 
			catID = jQuery(this).find('.filter-button:selected').attr('data-filter-catid');
			jQuery( ".postloader" ).show();
			jQuery(".element-item").css("opacity", "0.5");
			viewMore = '';
			pager = 1;
			calledAJAX(catID, filterTopic, viewMore,pager, pageSlug, btndata);
		});

        jQuery( document ).ajaxComplete(function() {
			jQuery( ".postloader" ).hide();
			jQuery(".element-item").css("opacity", "1");
        });

		jQuery(document).on('click', '.view-all-link', function(){
			viewMore = 'yes';
			pager = jQuery(this).attr('data-pager-index');
			if ( jQuery('.element-item').attr('data-filter-catid') != undefined)
            {
                catID = jQuery('.element-item').data('filter-catid');
                
            }
            jQuery(".element-item").css("opacity", "0.5");
			calledAJAX(catID, filterTopic, viewMore, pager, pageSlug, btndata);
			return false;
		});

		// jquery for sort filter
		jQuery('body').on('selectmenuchange', '.sortfilter', function(){
			jQuery(this).find('.filter-button').removeClass('cat-active');
			jQuery(this).find('.filter-button:selected').addClass('cat-active'); 
			btndata = jQuery(this).find('option:selected').attr('filter-data'); 
			viewMore = '';
			pager = 1;
			calledAJAX(catID, filterTopic, viewMore, pager, pageSlug, btndata);
		});

		// Menu Tracking code
		jQuery(".header-menu-wr ul.main-menu a").each(function(){
			jQuery(this).addClass('menu-analytic');
			var menulabel = jQuery(this).text();
			jQuery(this).attr("data-label-value",menulabel+' Menu');
		})

		jQuery('.menu-analytic').on('click', function(){
			var menuVal = jQuery(this).data('label-value');
			ga('send', 'event', 'Menu', 'click', menuVal);
		});

		/* Button Tracking code */
		jQuery('a.search-icon').addClass('btn-analytic');
		jQuery('a.search-icon').attr("data-label-value","Search Button");

		jQuery('.view-all-btn-wrapper').addClass('btn-analytic');
		jQuery('.view-all-btn-wrapper').attr("data-label-value","View All Button");

		jQuery('.header-logo-wr a').addClass('btn-analytic');
		jQuery('.header-logo-wr a').attr("data-label-value","Logo");

		jQuery('.btn-analytic').on('click', function(){
			var btnVal = jQuery(this).data('label-value');
			ga('send', 'event', 'Buttons', 'click', btnVal);
		});

		// post Tracking code 
		jQuery('.post-analytic').on('click', function(){
			var btnVal = jQuery(this).data('label-value');
			ga('send', 'event', 'Posts', 'click', btnVal);
		});

		// post single all link tracking code 
		jQuery(".left-single-content a").each(function(){
			jQuery(this).addClass('link-analytic');
			var linklabel = jQuery(this).text();
			jQuery(this).attr("data-label-value",linklabel);
		})

		jQuery('.link-analytic').on('click', function(){
			var linkVal = jQuery(this).data('label-value');
			ga('send', 'event', 'Post Links', 'click', linkVal);
		});

		// Footer all link tracking code
		jQuery("footer a").each(function(){
			jQuery(this).addClass('footer-analytic');
			var footerlabel = jQuery(this).text();
			jQuery(this).attr("data-label-value",footerlabel);
		})

		jQuery('.footer-analytic').on('click', function(){
			var footerVal = jQuery(this).data('label-value');
			ga('send', 'event', 'Footer Links', 'click', footerVal);
		});

		// home portfolio category tracking code
		jQuery(".filter-button").each(function(){
			jQuery(this).addClass('portfolio-analytic');
			var pflabel = jQuery(this).text();
			jQuery(this).attr("data-label-value",pflabel);
		})

		jQuery('.portfolio-analytic').on('click', function(){
			var pfVal = jQuery(this).data('label-value');
			ga('send', 'event', 'Home Portfolio', 'click', pfVal);
		});

		var ajaxCalls = function(obj, callback) {

		    jQuery.ajax({
	            url: obj.path,
	            type: obj.method,
	            dataType: 'json',
	            data: JSON.stringify(obj.postData),
	            processData: false,
	            contentType: "application/json"
	        })
	        .done(function(data, textStatus, jqXHR) {
				console.log(jqXHR.status);
				if ( jqXHR.status == 201 || jqXHR.status == 200) {
					callback(null, true, '', data, jqXHR);
				} else {
					var msg = data;
					callback(true, null, msg, data)
				}
	        })
	        .fail(function(jqXHR, textStatus, errorThrown) {
	        	callback(true, null)
	        	//console.log('Error!');
	        })
	        .always(function() {
	        	//console.log('Done!');
	        });
		};

	    // jquery for demo course data science form 
		jQuery('.demo-course-ds-submit').on('click', function() {
			var formObject = jQuery(this).parents('.democourseform');
			var dcdsfname = formObject.find('#dcdsfname').val();
			var dcdslname = formObject.find('#dcdslname').val();
			var dcdsemail = formObject.find('#dcdsemail').val();
			var dcdsphone = formObject.find('#dcdsphone').val();
			var dcdscity = formObject.find('#dcdscity').val();
			var dcdsstate = formObject.find('#dcdsstate').val();
			var dcdscountry = formObject.find('#dcdscountry').val();
			var dcdatascience = formObject.find('#dcdatascience option:selected').val();
			var dcdspageurl = formObject.find('.page-url').val();
			var dcdscourseemail = formObject.find('.course-email').val();
			var dcdsimagelink = formObject.find('.image-link').val();
			var dcdsvideolink = formObject.find('.video-link').val();
			var coursekey = formObject.find('#dcdatascience option:selected').attr("course-key");

			if(dcdsfname == "") {
	    		jQuery('#dcdsfname_err').html('Please Enter Your First Name');
	    		return false;
	    	} else {
	    		jQuery('#dcdsfname_err').html('');	
	    	}

	    	if(dcdslname == "") {
	    		jQuery('#dcdslname_err').html('Please Enter Your Last Name');
	    		return false;
	    	} else {
	    		jQuery('#dcdslname_err').html('');	
	    	}

	    	if(dcdsemail == "") {
	    		jQuery('#dcdsemail_err').html('Please Enter Your Email');
	    		return false;
	    	} else if(dcdsemail != "") {
	    		if(!validateEmail(dcdsemail)) {
		            jQuery('#dcdsemail_err').html('Please Enter Valid Email');	
		            return false;
		        } else {
		    		jQuery('#dcdsemail_err').html('');
		    	}	
	    	}

	    	if(dcdsphone == "") {
	    		jQuery('#dcdsphone_err').html('Please Enter Your Phone Number');
	    		return false;
	    	} else if(dcdsphone != "") {
	    		if(!validateMobile(dcdsphone)) {
		            jQuery('#dcdsphone_err').html('Please Enter Valid Phone Number');	
		            return false;
		        } else {
		    		jQuery('#dcdsphone_err').html('');
		    	}	
	    	}

	    	var datanew = { firstname: dcdsfname, lastname: dcdslname, email: dcdsemail, phoneNumber: dcdsphone, city: dcdscity, state: dcdsstate, country: dcdscountry, course: coursekey, coursename: dcdatascience, pageurl: dcdspageurl, courseemail: dcdscourseemail, imagelink: dcdsimagelink, videolink: dcdsvideolink };
	    	
	    	jQuery.ajax({
				type: 'POST',
				url:'https://www.upgrad.com/blog/wp-admin/admin-ajax.php?action=demo_course_ds_mail_sending', 
				data: JSON.stringify(datanew),
				contentType: "application/json",
				beforeSend: function() {
					jQuery('.ajax-loader').show();
				},
				success: function(response) {
					var response = JSON.parse(response);
					console.log(response);
					if(response.error) {
   						jQuery('.form-msg').html(response.error).show();
   					}
   					else if(response.success) {
   						var postData={
							"email": dcdsemail, 
							"firstname": dcdsfname, 
							"lastname": dcdslname, 
							"phoneNumber":dcdsphone,
							"state":dcdsstate,
							"city":dcdscity,
							"country":dcdscountry
						};

						postData.course = coursekey;

   						var obj = {
							path: 'https://prodapi.upgrad.com/apis/v2/register',
							method: 'POST',
							postData: postData,
						};
						ajaxCalls(obj, function(err, success, msg, data) {	
							if (success) {
								console.log(err);
								console.log(success);
								console.log(msg);
								console.log(data);

							} 
						});
						jQuery('.form-msg').html(response.success).show();
   						formObject[0].reset();
					}
   					jQuery('.ajax-loader').hide();
				}
			});
			return false;
		});

		// jquery for demo course management form 
		jQuery('.demo-course-m-submit').on('click', function() {
			var formObject = jQuery(this).parents('.democourseform');
			var dcmfname = formObject.find('#dcmfname').val();
			var dcmlname = formObject.find('#dcmlname').val();
			var dcmemail = formObject.find('#dcmemail').val();
			var dcmphone = formObject.find('#dcmphone').val();
			var dcmcity = formObject.find('#dcmcity').val();
			var dcmstate = formObject.find('#dcmstate').val();
			var dcmcountry = formObject.find('#dcmcountry').val();
			var dcmanagement = formObject.find('#dcmanagement option:selected').val();
			var dcmpageurl = formObject.find('.page-url').val();
			var dcmcourseemail = formObject.find('.course-email').val();
			var dcmimagelink = formObject.find('.image-link').val();
			var dcmvideolink = formObject.find('.video-link').val();
			var coursekey = formObject.find('#dcmanagement option:selected').attr("course-key");

			if(dcmfname == "") {
	    		jQuery('#dcmfname_err').html('Please Enter Your First Name');
	    		return false;
	    	} else {
	    		jQuery('#dcmfname_err').html('');	
	    	}

	    	if(dcmlname == "") {
	    		jQuery('#dcmlname_err').html('Please Enter Your Last Name');
	    		return false;
	    	} else {
	    		jQuery('#dcmlname_err').html('');	
	    	}

	    	if(dcmemail == "") {
	    		jQuery('#dcmemail_err').html('Please Enter Your Email');
	    		return false;
	    	} else if(dcmemail != "") {
	    		if(!validateEmail(dcmemail)) {
		            jQuery('#dcmemail_err').html('Please Enter Valid Email');	
		            return false;
		        } else {
		    		jQuery('#dcmemail_err').html('');
		    	}	
	    	}

	    	if(dcmphone == "") {
	    		jQuery('#dcmphone_err').html('Please Enter Your Phone Number');
	    		return false;
	    	} else if(dcmphone != "") {
	    		if(!validateMobile(dcmphone)) {
		            jQuery('#dcmphone_err').html('Please Enter Valid Phone Number');	
		            return false;
		        } else {
		    		jQuery('#dcmphone_err').html('');
		    	}	
	    	}

	    	var datanew = { firstname: dcmfname, lastname: dcmlname, email: dcmemail, phoneNumber: dcmphone, city: dcmcity, state: dcmstate, country: dcmcountry, course: coursekey, coursename: dcmanagement, pageurl: dcmpageurl, courseemail: dcmcourseemail, imagelink: dcmimagelink, videolink: dcmvideolink };
	    	
	    	jQuery.ajax({
				type: 'POST',
				url:'https://www.upgrad.com/blog/wp-admin/admin-ajax.php?action=demo_course_m_mail_sending', 
				data: JSON.stringify(datanew),
				contentType: "application/json",
				beforeSend: function() {
					jQuery('.ajax-loader').show();
				},
				success: function(response) {
					var response = JSON.parse(response);
					console.log(response);
					if(response.error) {
   						jQuery('.form-msg').html(response.error).show();
   					}
   					else if(response.success) {
   						var postData={
							"email": dcmemail, 
							"firstname": dcmfname, 
							"lastname": dcmlname, 
							"phoneNumber":dcmphone,
							"state":dcmstate,
							"city":dcmcity,
							"country":dcmcountry
						};

						postData.course = coursekey;

   						var obj = {
							path: 'https://prodapi.upgrad.com/apis/v2/register',
							method: 'POST',
							postData: postData,
						};
						ajaxCalls(obj, function(err, success, msg, data) {	
							if (success) {
								console.log(err);
								console.log(success);
								console.log(msg);
								console.log(data);

							} 
						});
						jQuery('.form-msg').html(response.success).show();
   						formObject[0].reset();
					}
   					jQuery('.ajax-loader').hide();
				}
			});
			return false;
		});

		// jquery for demo course technology form 
		jQuery('.demo-course-t-submit').on('click', function() {
			var formObject = jQuery(this).parents('.democourseform');
			var dctfname = formObject.find('#dctfname').val();
			var dctlname = formObject.find('#dctlname').val();
			var dctemail = formObject.find('#dctemail').val();
			var dctphone = formObject.find('#dctphone').val();
			var dctcity = formObject.find('#dctcity').val();
			var dctstate = formObject.find('#dctstate').val();
			var dctcountry = formObject.find('#dctcountry').val();
			var dctechnology = formObject.find('#dctechnology option:selected').val();
			var dctpageurl = formObject.find('.page-url').val();
			var dctcourseemail = formObject.find('.course-email').val();
			var dctimagelink = formObject.find('.image-link').val();

				type: 'POST',
				url:'https://www.upgrad.com/blog/wp-admin/admin-ajax.php?action=demo_course_t_mail_sending', 
				data: JSON.stringify(datanew),
				contentType: "application/json",
				beforeSend: function() {
					jQuery('.ajax-loader').show();
				},
				success: function(response) {
					var response = JSON.parse(response);
					console.log(response);
					if(response.error) {
   						jQuery('.form-msg').html(response.error).show();
   					}
   					else if(response.success) {
   						var postData={
							"email": dctemail, 
							"firstname": dctfname, 
							"lastname": dctlname, 
							"phoneNumber":dctphone,
							"state":dctstate,
							"city":dctcity,
							"country":dctcountry
						};

						postData.course = coursekey;

   						var obj = {
							path: 'https://prodapi.upgrad.com/apis/v2/register',
							method: 'POST',
							postData: postData,
						};
						ajaxCalls(obj, function(err, success, msg, data) {	
							if (success) {
								console.log(err);
								console.log(success);
								console.log(msg);
								console.log(data);

							} 
						});
						jQuery('.form-msg').html(response.success).show();
   						formObject[0].reset();
					}
   					jQuery('.ajax-loader').hide();
				}
			});
			return false;
		});

		// jquery for talk to counselor form 
		jQuery('.talk-counselor-submit').on('click', function() {
			var formObject = jQuery(this).parents('.talkcounselorform');
			var tcfname = formObject.find('#tcfname').val();
			var tclname = formObject.find('#tclname').val();
			var tcemail = formObject.find('#tcemail').val();
			var tcphone = formObject.find('#tcphone').val();
			var tcprogram = formObject.find('#tcprograms option:selected').val();
			var tccourse = formObject.find('#tccourses option:selected').val();
			var tcpageurl = formObject.find('.page-url').val();
			var tccourseemail = formObject.find('.course-email').val();
			var tcimagelink = formObject.find('.image-link').val();
			var tcvideolink = formObject.find('.video-link').val();
			var coursekey = formObject.find('#tccourses option:selected').attr("course-key");

			if(tcfname == "") {
	    		jQuery('#tcfname_err').html('Please Enter Your First Name');
	    		return false;
	    	} else {
	    		jQuery('#tcfname_err').html('');	
	    	}

	    	if(tclname == "") {
	    		jQuery('#tclname_err').html('Please Enter Your Last Name');
	    		return false;
	    	} else {
	    		jQuery('#tclname_err').html('');	
	    	}

	    	if(tcemail == "") {
	    		jQuery('#tcemail_err').html('Please Enter Your Email');
	    		return false;
	    	} else if(tcemail != "") {
	    		if(!validateEmail(tcemail)) {
		            jQuery('#tcemail_err').html('Please Enter Valid Email');	
		            return false;
		        } else {
		    		jQuery('#tcemail_err').html('');
		    	}	
	    	}

	    	if(tcphone == "") {
	    		jQuery('#tcphone_err').html('Please Enter Your Phone Number');
	    		return false;
	    	} else if(tcphone != "") {
	    		if(!validateMobile(tcphone)) {
		            jQuery('#tcphone_err').html('Please Enter Valid Phone Number');	
		            return false;
		        } else {
		    		jQuery('#tcphone_err').html('');
		    	}	
	    	}
	    	
	    	jQuery.ajax({
				type: 'POST',
				url:'https://www.upgrad.com/blog/wp-admin/admin-ajax.php?action=talk_counselor_mail_sending', 
				data: {'firstname':tcfname,'lastname':tclname,'email':tcemail,'phoneNumber':tcphone,'course':coursekey,'program':tcprogram,'coursename':tccourse,'pageurl':tcpageurl,'courseemail':tccourseemail,'imagelink':tcimagelink,'videolink':tcvideolink},
				beforeSend: function() {
					jQuery('.ajax-loader').show();
				},
				success: function(response) {
					var response = JSON.parse(response);
					console.log(response);
					if(response.error) {
   						jQuery('.form-msg').html(response.error).show();
   					}
   					else if(response.success) {
   						var postData={
							"email": tcemail, 
							"firstname": tcfname, 
							"lastname": tclname, 
							"phoneNumber": tcphone
						};

						postData.course = coursekey;

   						var obj = {
							path: 'https://prodapi.upgrad.com/apis/v2/register',
							method: 'POST',
							postData: postData,
						};
						ajaxCalls(obj, function(err, success, msg, data) {	
							if (success) {
								console.log(err);
								console.log(success);
								console.log(msg);
								console.log(data);

							} 
						});
						jQuery('.form-msg').html(response.success).show();
   						formObject[0].reset();
					}
   					jQuery('.ajax-loader').hide();
				},
				timeout: 1000000,
           		async: false
			});
			return false;
		});

		// sticky sidebar jquery
		/*jQuery(".right-single-content .widget_llama_widget").wrapInner("<div class='aside-inner'></div>");

		function Utils() { }

		Utils.prototype = {
		    constructor: Utils,
		    isElementInView: function (element, fullyInView) {
		        var pageTop = jQuery(window).scrollTop();
		        var pageBottom = pageTop + jQuery(window).height();
		        var elementTop = jQuery(element).offset().top;
		        var elementBottom = elementTop + jQuery(element).height();

		        if (fullyInView === true) {
		            return ((pageTop < elementTop) && (pageBottom > elementBottom));
		        } else {
		            return ((elementTop <= pageBottom) && (elementBottom >= pageTop));
		        }
		    }
		};

		var Utils = new Utils();

		if (jQuery("body").hasClass("single-post")) {

			var lastaside = jQuery(".right-single-content .widget_llama_widget");
			var stickyTop = lastaside.offset().top;
			if(jQuery(window).width() > 979) {
				jQuery(window).scroll(function() {
					console.log(stickyTop);
			      	var footer_offset = jQuery('.related-articlewr').offset().top; 
			      	var media_height = lastaside.height();
			      	var stick_afetr = footer_offset - (media_height);

			        if (jQuery(window).scrollTop() >= stickyTop) {
			    	 	lastaside.addClass('stick-aside');
			           	jQuery('.stick-aside').css('top', 100 + "px");
			        } else {
			        	lastaside.removeClass('stick-aside');
			        }

			        var isElementInView = Utils.isElementInView(jQuery('.related-articlewr'), false);
			        var isElementInfooter = Utils.isElementInView(jQuery('.site-footer'), false);
			        
					if (isElementInView || isElementInfooter) {
						console.log('in view');
		    			lastaside.removeClass('stick-aside');
		    			lastaside.addClass('stick-aside-after');
		    			lastaside.css('top',stick_afetr);
					} else {
		    			console.log('out of view');
		    			lastaside.removeClass('stick-aside-after');
					} 
				});
			} // end of if

		} // end of if*/
		
	}); // end of document ready event

	// jquery function for post category filter
	function calledAJAX(catID, filterTopic, viewMore, pager, pageSlug, btndata) {
	    jQuery('.category-field').val(catID);
	    jQuery('.topic-field').val(filterTopic);
	    jQuery.ajax({
	        type: 'POST',
	        data: {
	        	action: 'get-post-category',
	            catID: catID,
	            filterTopicID: filterTopic,
	            viewMore: viewMore,
	            pager: pager,
	            pageSlug: pageSlug,
	            btndata : btndata,
	        },
	        url: 'https://www.upgrad.com/blog/wp-admin/admin-ajax.php',
	        beforeSend: function() {},
	        success: function(response) {
	            response = JSON.parse(response);
	            if (!response.view_more_button) {
	                jQuery('.view-all-btn-wrapper').find('.view-all-link').fadeOut();
	            } else {
	                jQuery('.view-all-btn-wrapper').find('.view-all-link').fadeIn();
	                jQuery('.element-item').removeClass('ajax-result-item');
	            }
	            if (response.viewmore) {
	                jQuery('.ajax-response-container #homeportfolio-imageswr').append(response.posts).css({
	                    height: 'auto'
	                });
	                jQuery('.view-all-btn-wrapper').find('.view-all-link').attr('data-pager-index', response.pager);
	                jQuery(".ajax-result-item").each(function(i) {
	                    jQuery(this).delay(200 * i).animate({
	                        'opacity': 1,
	                        'marginTop': 0
	                    }, 0);
	                });
	            } else {
	                jQuery('.ajax-response-container #homeportfolio-imageswr').html(response.posts).css({
	                    height: 'auto'
	                });
	                jQuery('.view-all-btn-wrapper').find('.view-all-link').attr('data-pager-index', '2');
	                jQuery(".ajax-result-item").each(function(i) {
	                    jQuery(this).delay(200 * i).animate({
	                        'opacity': 1,
	                        'marginTop': 0
	                    }, 0);
	                });
	            }
	        }
	    });
	} 
</script>


<script src="//cdn.jsdelivr.net/youtube-google-analytics/8.0.2/lunametrics-youtube.gtm.min.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript" id="gtm-youtube-tracking">
	// Traking Youtube video iframe 
	var anon = function() {
	  var iframes = document.getElementsByTagName('iframe');
	  var embeds = document.getElementsByTagName('embed');
	  var i;

	  function isYouTubeVideo(potentialYouTubeVideo) {
	    var potentialYouTubeVideoSrc = potentialYouTubeVideo.src || '';
	    if( potentialYouTubeVideoSrc.indexOf( 'youtube.com/embed/' ) > -1 || potentialYouTubeVideoSrc.indexOf( 'youtube.com/v/' ) > -1 ) {
	      return true;
	    }
	  }

	  for(i = iframes.length - 1; i > -1; i--) {
	  	console.log(iframes.length);
	    var _iframe = iframes[i];
	    var test = isYouTubeVideo(_iframe);
	    if(test) {
	      return true;
	    }
	  }

	  for(i = embeds.length - 1; i > -1; i--) {
	    var _embed = embeds[i];
	    var test = isYouTubeVideo(_embed);
	    if(test) {
	      return true;
	    }
	  }
	  return false;
	}
</script>


<script type="text/javascript">

	function getMobileOperatingSystem() {
	  var userAgent = navigator.userAgent || navigator.vendor || window.opera;

	      // Windows Phone must come first because its UA also contains "Android"
	    if (/windows phone/i.test(userAgent)) {
	        return "Windows Phone";
	    }

	    if (/android/i.test(userAgent)) {
	        return "Android";
	    }

	    // iOS detection from: http://stackoverflow.com/a/9039885/177710
	    if (/iPad|iPhone|iPod/.test(userAgent) && !window.MSStream) {
	        return "iOS";
	    }

	    return "unknown";
	}

	// Event "page_loaded"

	jQuery(window).load(function() {

		var isMobile = /iPhone|iPad|iPod|Android/i.test(navigator.userAgent);

		var devicetype = 'Desktop';

		if (isMobile) {
			devicetype = 'Mobile/' + getMobileOperatingSystem();
		} 

		var platform = navigator.userAgent;

		var screenWH = window.screen.width+ 'x' +window.screen.height;

		var search_params = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);

		var utm_params = {
		  utm_source: search_params.has('utm_source') ? search_params.get("utm_source") : 'BLOG',
		  utm_medium: search_params.has('utm_medium') ? search_params.get("utm_medium") : 'NA',
		  utm_campaign: search_params.has('utm_campaign') ? search_params.get("utm_campaign") : 'NA',
		  utm_term: search_params.has('utm_term') ? search_params.get("utm_term") : 'NA',
		  utm_content: search_params.has('utm_content') ? search_params.get("utm_content") : 'NA'
		 }

		var currentUrl = window.location.href;
		var currenTitle = document.getElementsByTagName("title")[0].innerHTML;

		analytics.track('page_loaded', {
		  devicetype: devicetype,
		  platform_version: platform,
		  upgrad_app_version: 'NA',
		  logged_in_flaf: 'False',
		  screen_resolution: screenWH,
		  phone_brand: 'NA',
		  page_url: currentUrl,
		  pageCategory: "blog_page",
		  page_category: "blog_page",
		  program_package_key: 'Blog-HomePage',
		  page_title: currenTitle,
		  utm_source: utm_params.utm_source,
		  utm_campaign: utm_params.utm_campaign,
		  utm_term: utm_params.utm_term,
		  utm_medium: utm_params.utm_medium
		});

	});

	jQuery(document).ready(function() {

		var isMobile = /iPhone|iPad|iPod|Android/i.test(navigator.userAgent);

		var devicetype = 'Desktop';

		if (isMobile) {
			devicetype = 'Mobile/' + getMobileOperatingSystem();
		} 

		var platform = navigator.userAgent;

		var screenWH = window.screen.width+ 'x' +window.screen.height;

		//Book Free Counselling 
		jQuery('.book-button').click(function() {
            jQuery('#myBooking').show();
	        jQuery('.upskilling-main').hide();	
			jQuery('#heroDownload1').show();
			jQuery('#heroDownload4').hide();
			var handbook_fields = jQuery('#download_handbook_hero').val();
			jQuery('#heroDownload2').show();
			jQuery('#heroDownload2').html(handbook_fields);
			var handbook_fields = jQuery('#download_handbook_hero1').val();
			jQuery('#heroDownload3').show();
			jQuery('#heroDownload3').html(handbook_fields);
			var currentbookUrl = window.location.href;
            var currenbookTitle = document.getElementsByTagName("title")[0].innerHTML;

            var btnName = jQuery(this).text();
			analytics.track("lead_cta_click", {
               devicetype: devicetype,
               platform_version: platform,
               upgrad_app_version: "NA",
               logged_in_flaf: "False",
               screen_resolution: screenWH,
               phone_brand: "NA",
               page_url: currentbookUrl,
               page_category: "blog_page",
			   pageCategory: "blog_page",
               program_package_key: "Blog-HomePage",
               page_title: currenbookTitle,
               Button_name: "BOTTOM TAB/open_form_submit",
           });
        });

		//Book Free Counselling Redirect
		jQuery('.book-button-open').click(function() {

            var currenbookTitle = document.getElementsByTagName("title")[0].innerHTML;

            var btnName = jQuery(this).text();
			analytics.track("lead_cta_click", {
               devicetype: devicetype,
               platform_version: platform,
               upgrad_app_version: "NA",
               logged_in_flaf: "False",
               screen_resolution: screenWH,

			jQuery('body').on('click', '.related-articlewr .bx-controls-direction a, .homebannerslider a', function() {
				console.log('blog_banner_click');
				var eventclick = jQuery(this).text();

				var itemSelected = 'Redirect';
				if(eventclick == 'Prev') {
					itemSelected = 'Left';
				}
				if(eventclick == 'Next') {
					itemSelected = 'Right';
				}

				analytics.track('blog_banner_click', {
				  devicetype: devicetype,
				  platform_version: platform,
				  upgrad_app_version: 'NA',
				  logged_in_flaf: 'False',
				  screen_resolution: screenWH,
				  phone_brand: 'NA',
				  page_url: 'https://www.upgrad.com/blog/',
				  page_category: 'Blogs-Home',
				  program_package_key: 'Blog-HomePage',
				  page_title: 'Blog Home Page',
				  direction: itemSelected
				});

			});

		// Event "blog_card_click"

			jQuery('body').on('click', '.element-item a.post-analytic', function(e) {
				console.log('blog Card Click');
				e.preventDefault();
				var eventclick = jQuery(this).text();
				var itemSelected = jQuery(this).attr('href');
				var currentCardtitle = jQuery(this).find('.catetemp-posttitle').text();
				var currenturl = jQuery(this).attr('href');
				var currentpageurl = window.location.href;

				analytics.track('blog_card_click', {
					devicetype: devicetype,
				  platform_version: platform,
				  upgrad_app_version: 'NA',
				  logged_in_flaf: 'False',
				  screen_resolution: screenWH,
				  phone_brand: 'NA',
				  page_url: currentpageurl,
				  card_url: currenturl,
				  pageCategory: "blog_page",
				  page_category: "blog_page",
				  program_package_key: 'Blog-HomePage',
				  page_title: currentCardtitle
				});

				setTimeout(function(){ window.location.href = itemSelected; }, 1000);

			});



		//  Event "blog_footer_click"

					  devicetype: devicetype,

					  screen_resolution: screenWH,
					  phone_brand: 'NA',
					  page_url: 'https://www.upgrad.com/blog/',
					  page_category: 'Blogs-Home',
					  program_package_key: 'Blog-HomePage',
					  page_title: 'Blog Home Page',
					  selected_item: itemSelected
					});

					setTimeout(function(){ window.location.href = itemSelected; }, 800);

				});

			// For Mobile
				jQuery('#menu-footer-data-science-menu-2 a, #menu-footer-management-menu-2 a, #menu-footer-technology-menu-2 a, #menu-footer-upgrad-menu-1 a').on('click', function(e) {
					e.preventDefault();
					console.log('Footer Menuclick Mobile');
					var itemSelected = jQuery(this).attr('href');

					analytics.track('blog_navigation_click', {
					  devicetype: devicetype,
					  platform_version: platform,
					  upgrad_app_version: 'NA',
					  logged_in_flaf: 'False',
					  screen_resolution: screenWH,
					  phone_brand: 'NA',
					  page_url: 'https://www.upgrad.com/blog/',
					  page_category: 'Blogs-Home',
					  program_package_key: 'Blog-HomePage',
					  page_title: 'Blog Home Page',
					  navigation_item_selected: itemSelected
					});

					setTimeout(function(){ window.location.href = itemSelected; }, 800);

				});
		
		// Event "blog_load_more_click"	

			jQuery('.view-all-link').on('click', function() {
				console.log('Load More Click');

				analytics.track('blog_load_more_click', {
				  devicetype: devicetype,
				  platform_version: platform,
				  upgrad_app_version: 'NA',
				  logged_in_flaf: 'False',
				  screen_resolution: screenWH,
				  phone_brand: 'NA',
				  page_url: 'https://www.upgrad.com/blog/',
				  page_category: 'Blogs-Home',
				  program_package_key: 'Blog-HomePage',
				  page_title: 'Blogs-Home'
				});

			});	


		// Event "blog_links_click"	link in blogs data

			jQuery('article a').on('click', function(e) {
				e.preventDefault();
				console.log('Blog link Click');
				var itemSelected = jQuery(this).attr('href');

				analytics.track('blog_links_click', {
				  devicetype: devicetype,
				  platform_version: platform,
				  upgrad_app_version: 'NA',
				  logged_in_flaf: 'False',
				  screen_resolution: screenWH,
				  phone_brand: 'NA',
				  page_url: 'https://www.upgrad.com/blog/',
				  page_category: 'Blogs-Home',
				  program_package_key: 'Blog-HomePage',
				  page_title: 'Blog Home Page',
				  link_clicked: itemSelected
				});
				
				if(itemSelected){
				setTimeout(function(){ window.location.href = itemSelected; }, 1000);
				}

			});	


		// Event "blog_cta_redirect_click"

			jQuery('article a.postcustombtn').on('click', function(e) {
				console.log('Blog CTA redirect click');
				e.preventDefault();
				var btnName = jQuery(this).text();
				var itemSelected = jQuery(this).attr('href');

				analytics.track('blog_cta_redirect_click', {
				  devicetype: devicetype,
				  platform_version: platform,
				  upgrad_app_version: 'NA',
				  logged_in_flaf: 'False',
				  screen_resolution: screenWH,
				  phone_brand: 'NA',
				  page_url: 'https://www.upgrad.com/blog/',
				  page_category: 'Blogs-Home',
				  program_package_key: 'Blog-HomePage',
				  page_title: 'Blog Home Page',
				  Button_name: btnName
				});
				setTimeout(function(){ window.location.href = itemSelected; }, 1000);

			});	


		// Evnet "blog_form_submit"

			// Comment form
				// var formComment = document.getElementById('commentform');

				// analytics.trackForm(formComment, 'blog_form_submit', {
				// 	devicetype: devicetype,
				// 	platform_version: platform,
				// 	upgrad_app_version: 'NA',
				// 	logged_in_flaf: '',

				// 	program_package_key: 'Blog-HomePage',
				// 	page_title: 'Blog Home Page',
				// 	Button_name: "comment"
				// });


				var form = jQuery('#commentform');
				form.on('submit', function(e) {
				  if ( e.isDefaultPrevented() ) {
				    return
				  }
				  e.preventDefault();

				  analytics.track('blog_form_submit', {
						devicetype: devicetype,
						platform_version: platform,
						upgrad_app_version: 'NA',
						logged_in_flaf: 'False',
						screen_resolution: screenWH,
						phone_brand: 'NA',
						page_url: 'https://www.upgrad.com/blog/',
						page_category: 'Blogs-Home',
						program_package_key: 'Blog-HomePage',
						page_title: 'Blog Home Page',
						Button_name: "comment"
					});

				  // Submit the form now that all our analytics stuff is done
				  jQuery(e.target).unbind('submit').trigger('submit');
				});


		// Event "blog_search_click" 

			jQuery('.search-icon.btn-analytic').on('click', function() {

		   jQuery('#myBooking').hide();

		   jQuery('#heroDownload').hide();
		   var currenntcloseUrl = window.location.href;
		   var currentcloseTitle = document.getElementsByTagName("title")[0].innerHTML;

			analytics.track("modal_close_click", {
				   devicetype: devicetype,
				   platform_version: platform,
				   upgrad_app_version: "NA",
				   logged_in_flaf: "False",
				   screen_resolution: screenWH,
				   phone_brand: "NA",
				   page_url: currenntcloseUrl,
				   pageCategory: "blog_page",
				   page_category: "blog_page",
				   program_package_key: "Blog-HomePage",
				   page_title: currentcloseTitle,
				   Button_name: "POP UP/open_form_submit",
			});
		});

	});
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
	try{

		var isMobile = /iPhone|iPad|iPod|Android/i.test(navigator.userAgent);
		var devicetype = 'Desktop';
		if (isMobile) {
		devicetype = 'Mobile/' + getMobileOperatingSystem();
		} 
		var platform = navigator.userAgent;
		var screenWH = window.screen.width+ 'x' +window.screen.height;

	  //Global variable to keep track of which events we have already fired.
	  window.scrollTracker = {
	    "25" : 0,
	    "50" : 0,
	    "75" : 0,
	    "100" : 0
	  };
	  jQuery(window).on('scroll', function(){
	    //Capture the full length of the page
	    var windowHeight = jQuery(document).height();
	    //Capture where the top of the page is after scroll
	    var currentPosition = jQuery(document).scrollTop();
	    //Capture how many pixels can be viewed by the user
	    var windowViewingArea = jQuery(window).height();
	    //Figure out the bottom of what the user has scrolled to
	    var bottomScrollPosition = currentPosition + windowViewingArea;
	    //Figure out the rounded percentage of how much was scrolled
	    var percentScrolled = parseInt((bottomScrollPosition / windowHeight * 100).toFixed(0));
	    //console.log('User scrolled '+percentScrolled+'%');
	    //Store a variable to see if we can post the event
	    var fireEvent = 0;
	    //Store which quarter the user scrolled to
	    var scrollBucket = 0;
	    if(percentScrolled >= 25 && percentScrolled < 50){
	      if(scrollTracker["25"] === 0){
	        fireEvent = 1;
	        scrollTracker["25"] = 1;
	        scrollBucket = "25";
	      }
	    }else if(percentScrolled >= 50 && percentScrolled < 75){
	      if(scrollTracker["50"] === 0){
	        fireEvent = 1;
	        scrollTracker["50"] = 1;
	        scrollBucket = "50";
	      }
	    }else if(percentScrolled >= 75 && percentScrolled < 100){
	      if(scrollTracker["75"] === 0){
	        fireEvent = 1;
	        scrollTracker["75"] = 1;
	        scrollBucket = "75";
	      }
	    }else if(percentScrolled === 100){
	      if(scrollTracker["100"] === 0){
	        fireEvent = 1;
	        scrollTracker["100"] = 1;
	        scrollBucket = "100";
	      }
	    }
	    if(fireEvent !== 0){
	      console.log('sending event for '+scrollBucket+' bucket');

	      analytics.track('scroll', {
			  devicetype: devicetype,
			  platform_version: platform,
			  upgrad_app_version: 'NA',
			  logged_in_flaf: 'False',
			  screen_resolution: screenWH,
			  phone_brand: 'NA',
			  page_url: 'https://www.upgrad.com/blog/',
			  page_category: 'Blogs-Home',
			  program_package_key: 'Blog-HomePage',
			  component_name: 'NA',
			  scroll_depth: scrollBucket+'%',
			  page_title: 'Blogs - Home',
			  direction: 'Vertical'
			});
	    }
	  });
	}catch(e){
	  console.log('Error with performing the scroll tracker: '+e);
	}
</script>

</body>
</html>

<script>
    StackExchange.ready(function () {
        StackExchange.Hero.init("nso", "a");

        var location = 0;
        if ($("body").hasClass("questions-page")) {
            location = 1;
        } else if ($("body").hasClass("question-page")) {
            location = 1;
        } else if ($("body").hasClass("faq-page")) {
            location = 5;
        } else if ($("body").hasClass("home-page")) {
            location = 3;
        }

        $('.js-cta-button').click(function () {
            StackExchange.using("gps", function () {
                StackExchange.gps.track("hero.action", { hero_action_type: 'cta', location: location }, true);
            });
        });

        // TODO: we should review the class names and whatnot in use here. Older heroes use id selectors, the newer
        // sticky question hero on SO has a .js-dismiss class instead, but it's apparently not used anywhere... 
        // It's not great. Ideally we'd have a set of classes in the partials above that would correspond to 
        // the behaviours we want here in a more clear way. 

        // sticky question-page hero at the bottom of the page on SO
        $('.js-dismiss').on('click', function () {
            StackExchange.using("gps", function () {
                StackExchange.gps.track("hero.action", { hero_action_type: "close", location: location }, true);
            });
            StackExchange.Hero.dismiss();
            $(".js-dismissable-hero").fadeOut("fast");
        });
    });
</script>

                <img class="h-auto wmx100" src="https://cdn.sstatic.net/Sites/ai/Img/logo.svg?v=444d8193db78" alt="Artificial Intelligence">
            </a>

                <div class="d-flex ai-center gsx gs8">

<li class="ps-relative"  aria-current="false">


    <a
       href="/"

            <div id="question-header" class="d-flex sm:fd-column">
                        <h1 itemprop="name" class="fs-headline1 ow-break-word mb8 flex--item fl1"><a href="/questions/4176/are-there-real-applications-of-fuzzy-logic" class="question-hyperlink">Are there real applications of fuzzy logic?</a></h1>
                <div class="ml12 aside-cta flex--item print:d-none sm:ml0 sm:mb12 sm:order-first sm:as-end">
                        <a href="/questions/ask" class="ws-nowrap s-btn s-btn__primary">

<div class="postcell post-layout--right">
    <span class="d-none">$\begingroup$</span>
    <div class="s-prose js-post-body" itemprop="text">
                
<p><a href="https://ai.stackexchange.com/questions/10/what-is-fuzzy-logic">This question</a> covers in detail, what fuzzy logic is and how it relates to other math fields, such as boolean algebra and sets theory.</p>

<p><a href="https://ai.stackexchange.com/questions/118/how-can-fuzzy-logic-be-used-in-creating-ai">This question</a> is also very related, but the answers are focused more on general intuition and <em>potential</em> applicability. The only working system based on fuzzy logic, mentioned there, is <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mycin" rel="noreferrer">MYCIN</a>, which goes back to the early 70s. This quote from wiki summarizes my impression of it:</p>

<blockquote>
  <p>MYCIN was never actually used in practice.</p>
</blockquote>

<p>From my experience in AI, the best tool to deal with uncertainty is <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bayesian_probability" rel="noreferrer">Bayesian probability</a> and inference. It allows to apply not only a wide range of probabilistic tools, such as expectation, MLE, cross-entropy, etc, but also calculus and algebra.</p>

<p>Can you call fuzzy logic a "pure theoretical" concept, which only played its role in the early development of AI? Are there real practical applications of fuzzy logic? What problem would you recommend to solve and to <em>code</em> using fuzzy logic?</p>
    </div>

        <div class="mt24 mb12">
            <div class="post-taglist d-flex gs4 gsy fd-column">
                <div class="d-flex ps-relative fw-wrap">
                    <ul class='ml0 list-ls-none js-post-tag-list-wrapper d-inline'><li class='d-inline mr4 js-post-tag-list-item'><a href="/questions/tagged/ai-design" class="post-tag" title="show questions tagged &#39;ai-design&#39;" aria-label="show questions tagged &#39;ai-design&#39;" rel="tag" aria-labelledby="ai-design-container">ai-design</a></li><li class='d-inline mr4 js-post-tag-list-item'><a href="/questions/tagged/applications" class="post-tag" title="show questions tagged &#39;applications&#39;" aria-label="show questions tagged &#39;applications&#39;" rel="tag" aria-labelledby="applications-container">applications</a></li><li class='d-inline mr4 js-post-tag-list-item'><a href="/questions/tagged/problem-solving" class="post-tag" title="show questions tagged &#39;problem-solving&#39;" aria-label="show questions tagged &#39;problem-solving&#39;" rel="tag" aria-labelledby="problem-solving-container">problem-solving</a></li><li class='d-inline mr4 js-post-tag-list-item'><a href="/questions/tagged/fuzzy-logic" class="post-tag" title="show questions tagged &#39;fuzzy-logic&#39;" aria-label="show questions tagged &#39;fuzzy-logic&#39;" rel="tag" aria-labelledby="fuzzy-logic-container">fuzzy-logic</a></li></ul>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>

    <div class="mb0 ">
        <div class="mt16 d-flex gs8 gsy fw-wrap jc-end ai-start pt4 mb16">
            <div class="flex--item mr16 fl1 w96">

    </div>
</div>


            </div>

<a name="4230"></a>
<div id="answer-4230" class="answer js-answer accepted-answer js-accepted-answer" data-answerid="4230" data-parentid="4176" data-score="2" data-position-on-page="1" data-highest-scored="0" data-question-has-accepted-highest-score="0"  itemprop="acceptedAnswer" itemscope itemtype="https://schema.org/Answer">
    <div class="post-layout">
        <div class="votecell post-layout--left">
            <div class="js-voting-container d-flex jc-center fd-column ai-stretch gs4 fc-black-200" data-post-id="4230">
        <button class="js-vote-up-btn flex--item s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer "
                data-controller="s-tooltip"
                data-s-tooltip-placement="right"
                title="This answer is useful"
                aria-pressed="false"
                aria-label="Up vote"
                data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary"
                data-unselected-classes="">
            <svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon iconArrowUpLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M2 25h32L18 9 2 25Z"/></svg>
        </button>
        <div class="js-vote-count flex--item d-flex fd-column ai-center fc-black-500 fs-title"
             itemprop="upvoteCount"
             data-value="2">
            2
        </div>
        <button class="js-vote-down-btn flex--item s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer "
                data-controller="s-tooltip"
                data-s-tooltip-placement="right"
                title="This answer is not useful"
                aria-pressed="false"
                aria-label="Down vote"
                data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary"
                data-unselected-classes="">
            <svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon iconArrowDownLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="M2 11h32L18 27 2 11Z"/></svg>
        </button>



            <div class="js-accepted-answer-indicator flex--item fc-green-700 py6 mtn8" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" title="Loading when this answer was accepted&#x2026;" tabindex="0" role="note" aria-label="Accepted">
                <div class="ta-center">
                    <svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon iconCheckmarkLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="m6 14 8 8L30 6v8L14 30l-8-8v-8Z"/></svg>
                </div>
            </div>

    
        <a class="js-post-issue flex--item s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer py6 mx-auto" href="/posts/4230/timeline" data-shortcut="T" data-ks-title="timeline" data-controller="s-tooltip" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" title="Show activity on this post." aria-label="Timeline"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="mln2 mr0 svg-icon iconHistory" width="19" height="18" viewBox="0 0 19 18"><path d="M3 9a8 8 0 1 1 3.73 6.77L8.2 14.3A6 6 0 1 0 5 9l3.01-.01-4 4-4-4h3L3 9Zm7-4h1.01L11 9.36l3.22 2.1-.6.93L10 10V5Z"/></svg></a>

</div>

        </div>

        

<div class="answercell post-layout--right">
    <span class="d-none">$\begingroup$</span>
    <div class="s-prose js-post-body" itemprop="text">
<p>Fuzzy logic seems to have multiple of applications historically in Automotive Engineering.  </p>

<p>I found an interesting article on the subject from 1997. This excerpt provides an interesting rationale:</p>

<blockquote>
  <p>The key reason for fuzzy logic’s success in automotive engineering lies in the implications of its paradigm shift. Previously, engineers spent much time creating mathematical models of mechanical systems. More time went to real-world road tests that tuned the fudge factors of the control algorithms. If they succeeded, they ended up with a control algorithm of mathematical formulas involving many experimental parameters. Modifying or later optimizing such a solution is very difficult because of its lack of transparency. Fuzzy logic makes this design process faster, easier, and more transparent. It can implement control strategies using elements of everyday language. Everyone familiar with the control problem can read the fuzzy rules and understand what the system is doing and why. It also works for control systems with many control parameters. Designers can build innovative control systems that would have been intractable using traditional design techniques. <br><sub>SOURCE: <a href="ftp://ftp.me.psu.ac.th/pub/me/Fuzzy/88constantin.pdf" rel="nofollow noreferrer">Fuzzy Logic in
  Automotive Engineering</a>, 1997</sub></p>
</blockquote>

<p><br>Here are some papers and patents for automatic transmission control in motor vehicles. One of them is fairly recent: </p>

<p><a href="http://papers.sae.org/930674/" rel="nofollow noreferrer">Automatic Transmission Shift Schedule Control Using Fuzzy Logic</a> <br><sub>SOURCE: Society of Automotive Engineers, 1993</sub></p>

<p><a href="http://www.tandfonline.com/doi/abs/10.1080/00423119508969099?journalCode=nvsd20" rel="nofollow noreferrer">Fuzzy Logic in Automatic Transmission Control</a> <br><sub>SOURCE: International Journal of Vehicle Mechanics and Mobility, 2007</sub></p>

<p><a href="http://ipasj.org/IIJCS/Volume2Issue7/IIJCS-2014-06-24-3.pdf" rel="nofollow noreferrer">Fuzzy Logic Based Controller For Automated
Gear Control in Vehicles</a> <br><sub>SOURCE: International Journal of Computer Science, 2014</sub></p>

<p><a href="https://www.google.com/patents/US4841815" rel="nofollow noreferrer">Fuzzy control system for automatic transmission</a> | Patent | 1987</p>

<p><a href="https://www.google.com/patents/US5390117" rel="nofollow noreferrer">Transmission control with a fuzzy logic controller</a> | Patent | 1992</p>

<p><br> </p>

<p>Likewise with fuzzy logic anti-lock breaking systems (ABS):</p>

<p><a href="http://www.fuzzytech.com/e/e_a_sie.html" rel="nofollow noreferrer">Antilock-Braking System and Vehicle Speed Estimation using Fuzzy Logic</a> <br><sub>SOURCE: FuzzyTECH, 1996</sub></p>

<p><a href="https://www.ijser.org/researchpaper/FUZZY-LOGIC-ANTI-LOCK-BRAKE-SYSTEM.pdf" rel="nofollow noreferrer">Fuzzy Logic Anti-Lock Break System</a> <br><sub>SOURCE: International Journal of Scientific &amp; Engineering Research, 2012</sub></p>

<p><a href="https://www.google.com/patents/US5416709?dq=fuzzy%20logic%20abs&amp;hl=en&amp;sa=X&amp;ved=0ahUKEwiV8dOaguLWAhUHLSYKHbtQC18Q6AEIKDAA" rel="nofollow noreferrer">Fuzzy controller for anti-skid brake systems</a> | Patent | 1993</p>

<p><br> </p>

<p>This method seems to have been extended to aviation:</p>

<p><a href="http://aix.acad.ro/sectii2002/proceedings/doc2_2004/12_Ursu.pdf" rel="nofollow noreferrer">A Fuzzy Logic Control Synthesis for an Airplane Antilock-Breaking System</a> <br><sub>SOURCE: Proceedings of the Romanian Academy, 2004</sub></p>

<p><a href="https://www.google.com/patents/US8955793?dq=fuzzy%20logic%20abs&amp;hl=en&amp;sa=X&amp;ved=0ahUKEwiV8dOaguLWAhUHLSYKHbtQC18Q6AEIVDAG" rel="nofollow noreferrer">Landing gear method and apparatus for braking and maneuvering</a> | Patent | 2003</p>

<p><br></p>
    </div>
    <div class="mt24">

<div id="answer-4178" class="answer js-answer" data-answerid="4178" data-parentid="4176" data-score="4" data-position-on-page="2" data-highest-scored="1" data-question-has-accepted-highest-score="0"  itemprop="suggestedAnswer" itemscope itemtype="https://schema.org/Answer">

                <div class="ta-center">
                    <svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon iconCheckmarkLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="m6 14 8 8L30 6v8L14 30l-8-8v-8Z"/></svg>

        <a class="js-post-issue flex--item s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer py6 mx-auto" href="/posts/4178/timeline" data-shortcut="T" data-ks-title="timeline" data-controller="s-tooltip" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" title="Show activity on this post." aria-label="Timeline"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="mln2 mr0 svg-icon iconHistory" width="19" height="18" viewBox="0 0 19 18"><path d="M3 9a8 8 0 1 1 3.73 6.77L8.2 14.3A6 6 0 1 0 5 9l3.01-.01-4 4-4-4h3L3 9Zm7-4h1.01L11 9.36l3.22 2.1-.6.93L10 10V5Z"/></svg></a>

        </div>

        

<div class="answercell post-layout--right">
    <span class="d-none">$\begingroup$</span>
    <div class="s-prose js-post-body" itemprop="text">
<p>You've obviously never heard of <a href="http://www.samsung.com/in/support/skp/faq/138486" rel="nofollow noreferrer">fuzzy logic washing machines</a>.</p>

<blockquote>
  <p>● Typically, fuzzy logic controls the washing process, water intake,water temperature, wash time, rinse performance, and spin speed. This optimises the life span of the washing machine. More sophisticated machines weigh the load (so you can’t overload the washing machine), advise on the required amount of detergent, assess cloth material type and water hardness, and check whether the detergent is in powder or liquid form. Some machines even learn from past experience,memorising programs and adjusting them to minimise running costs. </p>
</blockquote>

<p>Fuzzy logic is used in a variety of control applications.  If your furnace can only be on or off, for example, you might use a probabilistic function of temperature to determine when to turn it on and off, rather than having fixed high and low temperatures activate your thermostat.  In some applications, that's been found to improve perceived comfort or efficiency.</p>

<p>For more sophisticated AI applications, you could use fuzzy logic for activations in a neural net, but I don't think it's offering much improvement over fixed, weighted activations.</p>
    </div>
    <div class="mt24">
        <div class="d-flex fw-wrap ai-start jc-end gs8 gsy">
            <time itemprop="dateCreated" datetime="2017-10-03T15:48:13"></time>
            <div class="flex--item mr16" style="flex: 1 1 100px;">

    <div class="d-flex gs8 s-anchors s-anchors__muted fw-wrap">

            <span class="d-none" itemprop="commentCount">2</span> 
    <div class="post-layout--right js-post-comments-component">
        <div id="comments-4178" class="comments js-comments-container bt bc-black-075 mt12 " data-post-id="4178" data-min-length="15">
            <ul class="comments-list js-comments-list"
                    data-remaining-comments-count="0"
                    data-canpost="false"
                    data-cansee="true"
                    data-comments-unavailable="false"
                    data-addlink-disabled="true">

                        <li id="comment-6499" class="comment js-comment " data-comment-id="6499" data-comment-owner-id="9647" data-comment-score="1">
        <div class="js-comment-actions comment-actions">
            <div class="comment-score js-comment-edit-hide">
                    <span title="number of &#x27;useful comment&#x27; votes received"
                            class="cool">1</span>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="comment-text  js-comment-text-and-form">
            <div class="comment-body js-comment-edit-hide">
                <span class="d-none">$\begingroup$</span>
                <span class="comment-copy">Actually, I have heard of them, but I never believe smart terms in <b>marketing</b>. It&#39;s possible that Samsung developers implemented some &quot;smart&quot; logic, but sales people decided that &quot;fuzzy logic&quot; sounds too cool in washing machines. If there&#39;s evidence that the implementation really uses Zadeh&#39;s fuzzy logic, I&#39;d be happy to call it a <i>real practical</i> application.</span>
                <span class="d-none">$\endgroup$</span>
              <div class="d-inline-flex ai-center">
&ndash;&nbsp;<a href="/users/9647/maxim"
                            title="1,897 reputation"
                            class="comment-user owner">Maxim</a>
                </div>
                <span class="comment-date" dir="ltr"><span title="2017-10-04 13:16:31Z, License: CC BY-SA 3.0" class="relativetime-clean">Oct 4, 2017 at 13:16</span></span>
            </div>
        </div>
    </li>
    <li id="comment-6509" class="comment js-comment " data-comment-id="6509" data-comment-owner-id="2329" data-comment-score="0">
        <div class="js-comment-actions comment-actions">
            <div class="comment-score js-comment-edit-hide">
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="comment-text  js-comment-text-and-form">
            <div class="comment-body js-comment-edit-hide">
                <span class="d-none">$\begingroup$</span>
                <span class="comment-copy">@Maxim-- It&#39;s real-- the concept was eagerly embraced by Japanese engineers going back to the 70s : <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fuzzy_logic#Early_applications" rel="nofollow noreferrer">en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fuzzy_logic#Early_applications</a></span>
                <span class="d-none">$\endgroup$</span>
              <div class="d-inline-flex ai-center">
&ndash;&nbsp;<a href="/users/2329/antlersoft"
                            title="617 reputation"

<a name="4231"></a>
<div id="answer-4231" class="answer js-answer" data-answerid="4231" data-parentid="4176" data-score="2" data-position-on-page="3" data-highest-scored="0" data-question-has-accepted-highest-score="0"  itemprop="suggestedAnswer" itemscope itemtype="https://schema.org/Answer">
    <div class="post-layout">
        <div class="votecell post-layout--left">
            <div class="js-voting-container d-flex jc-center fd-column ai-stretch gs4 fc-black-200" data-post-id="4231">
        <button class="js-vote-up-btn flex--item s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer "
                data-controller="s-tooltip"
                data-s-tooltip-placement="right"
                title="This answer is useful"
                aria-pressed="false"
                aria-label="Up vote"
                data-selected-classes="fc-theme-primary"
                data-unselected-classes="">

             itemprop="upvoteCount"
             data-value="2">
            2
        </div>
        <button class="js-vote-down-btn flex--item s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer "
                data-controller="s-tooltip"
                data-s-tooltip-placement="right"

            <div class="js-accepted-answer-indicator flex--item fc-green-700 py6 mtn8 d-none" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" title="Loading when this answer was accepted&#x2026;" tabindex="0" role="note" aria-label="Accepted">
                <div class="ta-center">
                    <svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon iconCheckmarkLg" width="36" height="36" viewBox="0 0 36 36"><path d="m6 14 8 8L30 6v8L14 30l-8-8v-8Z"/></svg>
                </div>
            </div>

    
        <a class="js-post-issue flex--item s-btn s-btn__unset c-pointer py6 mx-auto" href="/posts/4231/timeline" data-shortcut="T" data-ks-title="timeline" data-controller="s-tooltip" data-s-tooltip-placement="right" title="Show activity on this post." aria-label="Timeline"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="mln2 mr0 svg-icon iconHistory" width="19" height="18" viewBox="0 0 19 18"><path d="M3 9a8 8 0 1 1 3.73 6.77L8.2 14.3A6 6 0 1 0 5 9l3.01-.01-4 4-4-4h3L3 9Zm7-4h1.01L11 9.36l3.22 2.1-.6.93L10 10V5Z"/></svg></a>

</div>

        </div>

        

<div class="answercell post-layout--right">
    <span class="d-none">$\begingroup$</span>
    <div class="s-prose js-post-body" itemprop="text">
<p>The site <a href="http://www.fuzzytech.com/" rel="nofollow noreferrer">FuzzyTECH</a> lists an array of applications:</p>

<blockquote>
  <p><a href="http://www.fuzzytech.com/e/e_a_plc.html" rel="nofollow noreferrer">Industrial Automation</a> <br> 
  <a href="http://www.fuzzytech.com/e/e_a_glc.html" rel="nofollow noreferrer">Monitoring Glaucoma</a> <br> 
  <a href="http://www.fuzzytech.com/e/e_a_htw.html" rel="nofollow noreferrer">Coal Power Plant</a> <br>
  <a href="http://www.fuzzytech.com/e/e_a_kli.html" rel="nofollow noreferrer">Complex Chilling Systems</a> <br>
  <a href="http://www.fuzzytech.com/e/e_a_mull.html" rel="nofollow noreferrer">Refuse Incineration Plant</a> <br>
  <a href="http://www.fuzzytech.com/e/e_a_eet.html" rel="nofollow noreferrer">Fuzzy Logic Design</a> <br>
  <a href="http://www.fuzzytech.com/e/e_a_pfd.html" rel="nofollow noreferrer">Practical Design</a> <br>
  <a href="http://www.fuzzytech.com/e/e_a_dek.html" rel="nofollow noreferrer">Water Treatment System</a> <br>
  <a href="http://www.fuzzytech.com/e/e_a_spe.html" rel="nofollow noreferrer">Truck Speed Limiter</a> <br>
  <a href="http://www.fuzzytech.com/e/e_a_med.html" rel="nofollow noreferrer">Medical Shoe</a> <br>
  <a href="http://www.fuzzytech.com/e/e_a_med.html" rel="nofollow noreferrer">Fuzzy in Appliances</a> <br>
  <a href="http://www.fuzzytech.com/e/e_a_esw.html" rel="nofollow noreferrer">Automotive Engineering</a> <br>
  <a href="http://www.fuzzytech.com/e/e_a_sie.html" rel="nofollow noreferrer">Antilock Braking System</a> <br>
  <a href="http://www.fuzzytech.com/e/e_ap_afp.html" rel="nofollow noreferrer">Aircraft Flight Path</a> <br>
  <a href="http://www.fuzzytech.com/e/e_ap_nfu.html" rel="nofollow noreferrer">Nucluar Fusion</a> <br>
  <a href="http://www.fuzzytech.com/e/e_a_mot.html" rel="nofollow noreferrer">Motorla 68HC12 MCU</a> <br>
  <a href="http://www.fuzzytech.com/e/e_a_tfc.html" rel="nofollow noreferrer">Traffic Control</a> <br>
  <a href="http://www.fuzzytech.com/e/e_a_kumm.html" rel="nofollow noreferrer">Sonar Systems</a></p>
</blockquote>

<p>Most of the linked articles have good bibliographies citing numerous papers, although it's notable that most of the material is a few decades old.</p>
    </div>
    <div class="mt24">

<div class="answercell post-layout--right">
    <span class="d-none">$\begingroup$</span>
    <div class="s-prose js-post-body" itemprop="text">
<p>Recently, I needed to develop a Fuzzy Logic algorithm to made inferences of any data entrance; the real case applied was in Oil and Gas Industry, that the code needs to infere Joint Types in Fluid Pipelines. But with this Algorithm, the Computer Science Developer can infere any problems data, follow the link bellow:</p>

<p><a href="https://www.codeproject.com/Articles/5092762/Csharp-Fuzzy-Logic-API" rel="nofollow noreferrer">https://www.codeproject.com/Articles/5092762/Csharp-Fuzzy-Logic-API</a> (<em>C# Fuzzy Logic API</em>)</p>
    </div>
    <div class="mt24">
        <div class="d-flex fw-wrap ai-start jc-end gs8 gsy">
            <time itemprop="dateCreated" datetime="2020-03-03T18:10:25"></time>
            <div class="flex--item mr16" style="flex: 1 1 100px;">

<script type="rocketlazyloadscript">
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
    document.querySelectorAll('#primary-menu > .menu-item-has-children > a').forEach( function(item){
    	item.addEventListener('click', function(e){
    		e.preventDefault();
    		document.querySelectorAll('.menu-item-has-children .sub-menu').forEach( function(submenu){
    			submenu.classList.remove('show');
    		});
    		item.nextElementSibling.classList.add('show');
    	});
    });
    var ignoreClickOnMeElement = document.getElementById('primary-menu');
    
    document.addEventListener('click', function(event){   
      var isClickInsideElement = ignoreClickOnMeElement.contains(event.target);
      if (!isClickInsideElement) {
         document.querySelectorAll('.menu-item-has-children .sub-menu').forEach( function(submenu){
    		submenu.classList.remove('show');
    	});
    }
    });
}, false);
</script>

	<h1 class="entry-title">Fuzzy Logic Tutorial: What is, Architecture, Application, Example</h1><div class="entry-meta entry-meta-divider-customicon">
	<span class="posted-by"><span class="author-avatar"><a class="author-image" href="https://www.guru99.com/author/daniel"><img src="data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2025%2025'%3E%3C/svg%3E" width="25" height="25" alt="Daniel Johnson" class="avatar avatar-25 wp-user-avatar wp-user-avatar-25 alignnone photo" data-lazy-src="https://www.guru99.com/images/daniel-johnson-120x120.jpg" /><noscript><img src="https://www.guru99.com/images/daniel-johnson-120x120.jpg" width="25" height="25" alt="Daniel Johnson" class="avatar avatar-25 wp-user-avatar wp-user-avatar-25 alignnone photo" /></noscript></a><span class="image-size-ratio"></span></span><span class="meta-label">By</span><span class="author vcard"><a class="url fn n" href="https://www.guru99.com/author/daniel">Daniel Johnson</a></span></span>					<span class="updated-on">
						<span class="kadence-svg-iconset"><svg class="kadence-svg-icon kadence-hours-alt-svg" fill="currentColor" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><title>Hours</title><path d="M23 12c0-3.037-1.232-5.789-3.222-7.778s-4.741-3.222-7.778-3.222-5.789 1.232-7.778 3.222-3.222 4.741-3.222 7.778 1.232 5.789 3.222 7.778 4.741 3.222 7.778 3.222 5.789-1.232 7.778-3.222 3.222-4.741 3.222-7.778zM21 12c0 2.486-1.006 4.734-2.636 6.364s-3.878 2.636-6.364 2.636-4.734-1.006-6.364-2.636-2.636-3.878-2.636-6.364 1.006-4.734 2.636-6.364 3.878-2.636 6.364-2.636 4.734 1.006 6.364 2.636 2.636 3.878 2.636 6.364zM11 6v6c0 0.389 0.222 0.727 0.553 0.894l4 2c0.494 0.247 1.095 0.047 1.342-0.447s0.047-1.095-0.447-1.342l-3.448-1.723v-5.382c0-0.552-0.448-1-1-1s-1 0.448-1 1z"></path>

<div>
<h2><a id="1" data-lasso-id="198417" href="#"></a>What Is Fuzzy Logic?</h2>
<p><strong>Fuzzy Logic</strong> is defined as a many-valued logic form which may have truth values of variables in any real number between 0 and 1. It is the handle concept of partial truth. In real life, we may come across a situation where we can&#8217;t decide whether the statement is true or false. At that time, fuzzy logic offers very valuable flexibility for reasoning.</p>
</div>
<p>Fuzzy logic algorithm helps to solve a problem after considering all available data. Then it takes the best possible decision for the given the input. The FL method imitates the way of decision making in a human which consider all the possibilities between digital values T and F.</p>
<p>In this tutorial, you will learn</p>
<ul>
<li><a href="#1">What Is Fuzzy Logic?    		</a></li>
<li><a href="#2">History of Fuzzy Logic Systems</a></li>
<li><a href="#3">Characteristics of Fuzzy Logic    </a></li>
<li><a href="#4">When not to use fuzzy logic    </a></li>
<li><a href="#5">Fuzzy Logic Architecture   </a></li>
<li><a href="#6">Fuzzy Logic vs. Probability    </a></li>
<li><a href="#7">Crisp vs. Fuzzy   </a></li>
<li><a href="#8">Classical Set vs. Fuzzy set Theory    </a></li>
<li><a href="#9">Fuzzy Logic Examples    </a></li>
<li><a href="#10">Application Areas of Fuzzy Logic    </a></li>
<li><a href="#11">Advantages of Fuzzy Logic System    </a></li>
<li><a href="#12">Disadvantages of Fuzzy Logic Systems    </a></li>
</ul>
<h2><a id="2" data-lasso-id="198418" href="#"></a>History of Fuzzy Logic Systems</h2>
<p>Although, the concept of fuzzy logic had been studied since the 1920&#8217;s. The term fuzzy logic was first used with 1965 by Lotfi Zadeh a professor of UC Berkeley in California. He observed that conventional computer logic was not capable of manipulating data representing subjective or unclear human ideas.</p>
<p>Fuzzy algorithm has been applied to various fields, from control theory to AI. It was designed to allow the computer to determine the distinctions among data which is neither true nor false. Something similar to the process of human reasoning. Like Little dark, Some brightness, etc.</p>
<h2><a id="3" data-lasso-id="198419" href="#"></a>Characteristics of Fuzzy Logic</h2>
<p>Here, are some important characteristics of fuzzy logic:</p>
<ul>
<li>Flexible and easy to implement <a href="/machine-learning-tutorial.html" data-lasso-id="198420">machine learning</a> technique</li>
<li>Helps you to mimic the logic of human thought</li>
<li>Logic may have two values which represent two possible solutions</li>
<li>Highly suitable method for uncertain or approximate reasoning</li>
<li>Fuzzy logic views inference as a process of propagating elastic constraints</li>
<li>Fuzzy logic allows you to build nonlinear functions of arbitrary complexity.</li>
<li>Fuzzy logic should be built with the complete guidance of experts</li>
</ul>
<h2><a id="4" data-lasso-id="198421" href="#"></a>When not to use fuzzy logic</h2>
<p>However, fuzzy logic is never a cure for all. Therefore, it is equally important to understand that where we should not use fuzzy logic.</p><div class='code-block code-block-2' style='margin: 8px 0; clear: both;'>
<!-- Async AdSlot 1 for Ad unit 'guru99.com_728x90' ### Size: [[728,90],[468,60],[300,250]] -->
<!-- Adslot's refresh function: googletag.pubads().refresh([gptadslots[0]]) -->
<style>

@media(min-width: 1024px) { .videocontentmobile {min-height: 250px; } }
</style>
<div class="videocontentmobile">

      });
    }
