Article</a></div></div></div><div class="col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-12 item"><div class=recommended-article-tile><a href=https://www.edureka.co/blog/install-tensorflow class=recommended-articles-link 		<h1 class="entry-title" itemprop="name">Fuzzy Logic System</h1>
<p class="single-title"><span class="mobsite">By <img src="data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2050%20100'%3E%3C/svg%3E" width="50" height="100" alt="Priya Pedamkar" title="Priya Pedamkar" class="avatar avatar-100 wp-user-avatar wp-user-avatar-100 alignnone photo" style="display:inline-block;float:none;margin-bottom:0;margin-right:0.7rem;vertical-align:middle;" data-lazy-src="https://cdn.educba.com/academy/wp-content/uploads/2021/02/Priya-Pedamkar-150x150.png"><noscript><img src="https://cdn.educba.com/academy/wp-content/uploads/2021/02/Priya-Pedamkar-150x150.png" width="50" height="100" alt="Priya Pedamkar" title="Priya Pedamkar" class="avatar avatar-100 wp-user-avatar wp-user-avatar-100 alignnone photo" style="display:inline-block;float:none;margin-bottom:0;margin-right:0.7rem;vertical-align:middle;"></noscript><a style="color:#fff" href="https://www.educba.com/author/priya-pedamkar/">Priya Pedamkar</a></span></p>		</div></section>
		<div class="content-sidebar-wrap"><div class="breadcrumb"><span><span><a href="https://www.educba.com/">Home</a> » <span><a href="https://www.educba.com/data-science/">Data Science</a> » <span><a href="https://www.educba.com/data-science/data-science-tutorials/">Data Science Tutorials</a> » <span><a href="https://www.educba.com/data-science/data-science-tutorials/artificial-intelligence-tutorial/">Artificial Intelligence Tutorial</a> » <strong class="breadcrumb_last" aria-current="page">Fuzzy Logic System</strong></span></span></span></span></span></div><main class="content"><article class="post-234162 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail category-artificial-intelligence-tutorial category-data-science category-data-science-tutorials entry" itemref="page-header"><div class="entry-content"><div style="display:flex;padding:10px 0;margin:10px 0;position:relative;float:right;">
<a href="https://www.educba.com/applications-of-fuzzy-logic/" title="Previous" style="float:right;margin-right:20px;border: thin solid #087c99; padding: 5px 20px;text-decoration:none;"><i class="fa fa-arrow-left" style="color: #087c99;font-weight:bold;"></i></a>
<a href="https://www.educba.com/implementation-of-neural-networks/" title="Next" style="float:right;margin-right:20px;border: thin solid #087c99; padding: 5px 20px;text-decoration:none;" ><i class="fa fa-arrow-right" style="color: #087c99;font-weight:bold;"></i></a>
</div><div style="clear:both"></div><p><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-237433" src="data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20837%20471'%3E%3C/svg%3E" alt="Fuzzy logic system" width="837" height="471" data-lazy-srcset="https://cdn.educba.com/academy/wp-content/uploads/2019/11/Fuzzy-logic-system.png 837w, https://cdn.educba.com/academy/wp-content/uploads/2019/11/Fuzzy-logic-system-300x169.png 300w, https://cdn.educba.com/academy/wp-content/uploads/2019/11/Fuzzy-logic-system-768x432.png 768w" data-lazy-sizes="(max-width: 837px) 100vw, 837px" data-lazy-src="https://cdn.educba.com/academy/wp-content/uploads/2019/11/Fuzzy-logic-system.png" /><noscript><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-237433" src="https://cdn.educba.com/academy/wp-content/uploads/2019/11/Fuzzy-logic-system.png" alt="Fuzzy logic system" width="837" height="471" srcset="https://cdn.educba.com/academy/wp-content/uploads/2019/11/Fuzzy-logic-system.png 837w, https://cdn.educba.com/academy/wp-content/uploads/2019/11/Fuzzy-logic-system-300x169.png 300w, https://cdn.educba.com/academy/wp-content/uploads/2019/11/Fuzzy-logic-system-768x432.png 768w" sizes="(max-width: 837px) 100vw, 837px" /></noscript></p>
<h2>Introduction to Fuzzy Logic System</h2>
<p>Fuzzy Logic is a computing approach based on “Degree of Truth” and is not limited to Boolean “true or false.” The term ‘Fuzzy’ means something vague or not very clear. The fuzzy Logic system is applied to scenarios where it is difficult to categorize states as a binary “True or False.” Fuzzy Logic can incorporate intermediate values like partially true and partially false. It can be implemented across a wide range of devices ranging from small micro-controller to large IT systems. It tries to mimic human-like decision-making, which can incorporate all values in between True and False.</p><div class='code-block code-block-21' style='margin: 8px 0; clear: both;'>
    <!-- inside 556898 -->
        <!-- new woody banner ## 2022-->
        <style>#banner_1_2022 .fa-book:before{content:"\f14e"}#banner_1_2022 .fa-book{background-image:linear-gradient(to top,#0ba360 0,#3cba92 100%);padding:15px;border-radius:5px;color:#f0f8ff;font-size:50px}#banner_1_2022 .fa-flash:before,.fa-bolt:before{content:"\f1fa"}#banner_1_2022 .box-btn{width:max-content;cursor:pointer;transition:all .2s ease;padding:10px 30px;line-height:1.33;border-radius:4px;color:#fff;background:#ff8c00;border:thin solid #ff8c00;margin-bottom:0;font-weight:700;text-align:center;vertical-align:middle;font-size:15px;display:block;letter-spacing:1px;background-image:linear-gradient(to top,#e93f33,#ea4b32,#eb5632,#ec6032,#ec6a33);}#banner_1_2022{border:1px #bfbfbf solid;margin:10px 0 25px 0;padding:24px;width:100%;-webkit-box-shadow:-8px 9px 5px -8px rgba(0,0,0,.75);-moz-box-shadow:-8px 9px 5px -8px rgba(0,0,0,.75);box-shadow:-8px 9px 5px -8px rgba(0,0,0,.75)}#banner_1_2022 .course-title{font-weight: 700; font-size: 2em; letter-spacing: 1.1px; display: block;line-height: 35px;}#banner_1_2022 .fa-star{font-size:15px;color:#f5af12;margin-right:4px}#banner_1_2022 .price-box{text-align:-webkit-center}@media (min-device-width :320px) and (max-device-width :520px){#banner_1_2022 .banr-image{display:none}#banner_1_2022 .price-box{text-align:-webkit-left}}@media (min-device-width :320px) and (max-device-width :767px){.sale-bf{position:absolute;width:80px;margin-top:-5.4em;right:0em}}#banner_1_2022 .othr-cour{border-radius:4px;border:solid 1px #4a4a4a;margin-right:12px;padding:5px 10px;font-size:14px;font-weight:400;display:inline-block;margin-bottom:5px;cursor:pointer;line-height:1.4}#banner_1_2022 .rel-cour{font-size:16px;padding-bottom:5px}@media (min-device-width :768px){.centertext{text-align:center}.sale-bf{position:absolute;width:120px;margin-top:-6.1em;right:2.5em}}.blg-price{font-size:1.5em}.blg-str-price strike{font-size:1.2em;color:grey}#banner_1_2022 hr{margin:0 0 .5em;padding:.5em 0 0}#banner_1_2022 .banr-image{text-align:center;margin-top:20px}#banner_1_2022 .bundle_link{text-decoration:none;color:#000;border:0}#banner_1_2022 .bullets{padding-top:1em;     #banner_1_2022{ border-radius: 20px;background-image: linear-gradient(-20deg, #00cdac 0%, #8ddad5 100%);
    font-family: 'verdena', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-box-shadow: 0px 10px 5px -9px rgb(0 0 0 / 75%); -moz-box-shadow: 0px 10px 5px -9px  rgba(0,0,0,.75); box-shadow: 0px 10px 5px -9px rgba(0,0,0,.75);}

                <div class="five-sixths box-div" id="banner_1_2022" >
                <a href="https://www.educba.com/data-science/courses/data-science-course/?btnz=edu-blg-inline-banner1-2022" class="bundle_link" target="_blank">

</div>

<h3>An Architecture of Fuzzy Logic System</h3>
<p>The Fuzzy Logic System has four major components, which are explained with the help of the architecture diagram below:</p><div class='code-block code-block-19' style='margin: 8px 0; clear: both;'>
<!-- modal popup -->

<style>
.inline-pp-banner {display:block;background:#faffbd;padding:20px 15px;border:1px solid #36a67b;border-radius:3px;}
.inline-fc-mob{cursor:pointer;font-weight:bold}
@media only screen and (min-width: 768px){
.inline-pp-banner{display:none;}
}
</style>
<div class="inline-pp-banner">
<p style="margin-bottom:0px;color:#000"><a class="popmake-173362 inline-fc-mob">Start Your Free Data Science Course</a></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0;"><small>Hadoop, Data Science, Statistics & others</small></p>
</div>


</div>

<p><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-234170" src="data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20672%20348'%3E%3C/svg%3E" alt="fuzzy logic" width="672" height="348" data-lazy-srcset="https://cdn.educba.com/academy/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/fuzzy-logic.png 672w, https://cdn.educba.com/academy/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/fuzzy-logic-300x155.png 300w" data-lazy-sizes="(max-width: 672px) 100vw, 672px" data-lazy-src="https://cdn.educba.com/academy/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/fuzzy-logic.png" /><noscript><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-234170" src="https://cdn.educba.com/academy/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/fuzzy-logic.png" alt="fuzzy logic" width="672" height="348" srcset="https://cdn.educba.com/academy/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/fuzzy-logic.png 672w, https://cdn.educba.com/academy/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/fuzzy-logic-300x155.png 300w" sizes="(max-width: 672px) 100vw, 672px" /></noscript></p>
<ul>
<li><strong>Rules: </strong>Rule Base consists of a large set of rules programmed and fed by experts that govern the Fuzzy System&#8217;s decision-making. The rules are sets of “If-Then” statements that decide the event occurrence based on condition.</li>
<li><strong>Fuzzification: </strong>Fuzzification converts raw inputs measured from sensors into fuzzy sets. These converted inputs are passed on to the control system for further processing.</li>
<li><strong>Inference Engine: </strong>It helps in mapping rules to the input dataset and thereby decides which rules are to be applied for a given input. It does so by calculating the % match of the rules for the given input.</li>
<li><strong>Defuzzification: </strong>It is the opposite of Fuzzification. Here fuzzy sets are converted into crisp inputs. These crisp inputs are the output of the Fuzzy Logic System.</li>
</ul>
<h3>Membership Function</h3>
<p>The Membership Function defines how input to the Fuzzy System is mapped to values between 0 and 1. Input is usually termed as Universe (U) as it can contain any value. The membership function is defined as:</p>
<p>μ A:X → [0,1].</p>
<p>Here X represents the Universe, and Y represents any value between 0 and 1. The Triangular Membership function is the most commonly used Membership Function. Other Membership function includes Trapezoidal, Gaussian and Singleton.</p>
<h3>Why and When to Use Fuzzy Logic?</h3>
<p>Fuzzy Logic is especially useful when you want to mimic human-like thinking in a control system. More than accurate reasoning, it focuses on acceptable reasoning, which is very close to how the real world operates. It is designed to deal with uncertainties and is proficient in finding out inferences from the conclusion.</p>
<h4>Algorithm of Fuzzy Logic System</h4>
<ol>
<li>Define all the variables and terms which will be acting as input to the Fuzzy System</li>
<li>Create Membership Function for the System( As defined above)</li>
<li>Create Rule-Base, which will be mapped to each input</li>
<li>Convert normal input into fuzzy input, which is fed to the membership function</li>
<li>Evaluate the result from the membership function</li>
<li>Combine all the results obtained from the Individual Ruleset</li>
<li>Convert the output fuzzy set into Crisp input(Defuzzification)</li>
</ol>
<h3>Application of Fuzzy Logic System</h3>
<p>Fuzzy Logic is being adopted across all major industries, but Automotive remains the major adopters. A few of its applications are listed below:</p>
<ul>
<li>Nissan is using Fuzzy Logic to control the braking system in case of a hazard. Fuzzy Logic uses inputs like speed, acceleration, momentum to decide on brakes intensity.</li>
<li>Nissan is also using Fuzzy Logic to control the fuel injection quantity and ignition based on inputs like Engine RPM, Temperature and Load capacity.</li>
<li>It is used in Satellites and Aircraft for Altitude control.</li>
<li>Mitsubishi is using Fuzzy Logic to make Elevator Management more efficient by taking passenger traffic as input.</li>
<li>Nippon Steel uses Fuzzy Logic to decide the proportion in which different cement types should be mixed to make more durable cement.</li>
<li>Fuzzy Logic finds its application in the chemical industry for managing different processes like pH control, drying process, and distillation process.</li>
<li>Fuzzy Logic can be combined with Artificial Neural Network (ANN) to mimic how a human brain works. Fuzzy Logic aggregates data and transforms it into more meaningful information, which is used as Fuzzy sets.</li>
</ul>
<h3>Advantages of Fuzzy Logic System</h3>
<p>Below are five advantages of the fuzzy logic system:</p>
<ul>
<li>Fuzzy Logic can work with any kind of input even if it is unstructured, distorted, imprecise or contain noise.</li>
<li>Fuzzy Logic Construction is very easy to read and comprehend as it closely mimics the way Human-Mind make the decision.</li>
<li>Fuzzy Logic&#8217;s nuances involve using key math concepts like Set Theory and Probability, which makes it apt to solve all kinds of day-to-day challenges that humanity faces.</li>
<li><a href="https://www.educba.com/applications-of-fuzzy-logic/">Fuzzy Logic can provide</a> efficient solutions to a very complex problem across different industries.</li>
<li>Fuzzy Logic System needs a very little amount of data to prepare a robust model. Therefore, it needs only a limited amount of memory for its execution.</li>
</ul>
<h3>Disadvantages of Fuzzy Logic System</h3>
<p>Below are the top four disadvantages of the fuzzy logic system:</p>
<ul>
<li>There is no standard way to solve a problem through Fuzzy Logic; therefore, different experts may have a different solution to a problem, leading to ambiguity.</li>
<li>As Fuzzy Logic System works with precise and imprecise data, at times, its accuracy can be compromised.</li>
<li>Fuzzy Logic System cannot learn from its past mistakes or failures as it doesn’t have self-learning ability like Machine Learning and Neural Network.</li>
<li>Due to the lack of standardization, there is no one fixed way to find rules and membership functions for the given problem. Therefore, at times it becomes difficult to find exact rules and membership functions for some problems.</li>
</ul>
<h3>Conclusion</h3>
<p>Fuzzy Logic provides an alternative way to approach real-world problems in the computing world. It can be easily applied to different applications and control system, which can reap long term benefits. Given its ability to work well with “Degree of Truth”, it opens many doors to modern computing. However, it is not the panacea to all the problems as it has severe limitations when it comes to accuracy and its inability to learn from its failure, as in the case of Machine Learning.</p>
<h3>Recommended Articles</h3>
<p>This is a guide to the Fuzzy Logic System. Here we discuss why and when to use the fuzzy system, with architecture, application, and last with advantages and disadvantages. You can also go through our other related articles to learn more &#8211;</p>
<ol>

</ol>

<script>
var fixmeTop = jQuery('.rel-courses').offset().top;
jQuery(window).scroll(function() {
    var currentScroll = jQuery(window).scrollTop();
    if (currentScroll >= fixmeTop) {
        jQuery('.rel-courses').css({
            position: 'fixed',
            top: '6em',
            left: '4.2em'
        });
    } else {
        jQuery('.rel-courses').css({
            position: 'static'
        });
    }
});
</script>

                jQuery(function($) {
                    function equalHeight(group) {
                        tallest = 0;
                        group.each(function() {
                            thisHeight = $(this).height();
                            if(thisHeight > tallest) {
                                tallest = thisHeight;
                            }
                        });
                        group.height(tallest);
                    }

                    equalHeight($(".dg-grid-shortcode .dg_grid-shortcode-col"));

                    $(window).resize(function() {
                        equalHeight($(".dg-grid-shortcode .dg_grid-shortcode-col"));
                    });
                });
            </script>

<script type="text/javascript">
plt = '';
user_envir = '';
jQuery(document).ready(function(){

if( /Android|webOS|iPhone|iPad|iPod|BlackBerry|IEMobile|Opera Mini/i.test(navigator.userAgent) ) {
	plt = "mobile";
	user_envir = encodeURIComponent(navigator.userAgent);
} else {
	plt = "desktop";
	user_envir = encodeURIComponent(navigator.userAgent);
}

jQuery('#nw-form-free-crs').on('submit', function (e) {
jQuery('input[type="submit"]').attr('disabled', true);
jQuery("#nw-loader-free-crs").css("display","block");

uem = encodeURIComponent(jQuery("#nww-email-free-crs").val());
sg = jQuery("#nw-suid-free-crs").val();
var urlx = jQuery("#nw-url-free-crs").val();
zipcode = jQuery("#nw-user-phone-free-crs").val();
mntrm = jQuery("#nw-mn-trm-tx-id").val();
if(jQuery('#nww-mob-free-crs').length){
var mbn = jQuery("#nww-mob-free-crs").val();
}
if(uem == '') {
jQuery("#nw-loader-free-crs").css("display","none");
jQuery('input[type="submit"]').attr('disabled', false);
jQuery("#nw-error-free-crs").css("display","block");
jQuery('#nw-error-free-crs').html("<div class='alert alert-danger fade in' role='alert'><i class='fa fa-warning alert-danger'></i><span id='err-free-crs'>Please enter your email.</span></div>");
} else {
var fregt = jQuery("#fcdp-trs-nw").val();
jQuery.ajax({
type : "POST",
dataType: "json",
cache: false,
url  : 'https://www.educba.com/edb_jx/gtk_fregtk.php',
data: 't=' + fregt,
async: true,
success : function(response){
	jQuery("#fcdp-trs-nw").attr("value",response.tk);
	fregt = jQuery("#fcdp-trs-nw").val();
	
jQuery.ajax({
method : "POST",
dataType: "json",
cache: false,
url  : 'https://www.educba.com/ajax/nwz-frz-rgsz.php',
data : 'em=' + uem + '&sgs=' + sg + '&envir=' + plt + '&upf=' + user_envir+'&urlx=' +urlx+'&zipcode='+zipcode+'&mntrm='+mntrm + '&t=' + fregt + '&mb=' + mbn,
async: true,
success : function(resp){
jQuery("#nw-loader-free-crs").css("display","none");
if(resp.access == "no") {
if(resp.eml_error == "yes") {
jQuery('input[type="submit"]').attr('disabled', false);
jQuery("#nw-error-free-crs").css("display","block");
jQuery('#nw-error-free-crs').html("<div class='alert alert-danger fade in' role='alert'><i class='fa fa-warning alert-danger'></i><span id='err-free-crs'>Please enter your valid email (Check your email for spelling mistakes).</span></div>");
}else if(resp.mb_error == "yes") {
jQuery('input[type="submit"]').attr('disabled', false);
jQuery("#nw-error-free-crs").css("display","block");
jQuery('#nw-error-free-crs').html("<div class='alert alert-danger fade in' role='alert'><i class='fa fa-warning alert-danger'></i><span id='err-free-crs'>Please enter all the details.</span></div>");
}else if(resp.usr_exists == "yes") {
jQuery('input[type="submit"]').attr('disabled', false);
jQuery("#nw-error-free-crs").css("display","block");
jQuery('#nw-error-free-crs').html("<div class='alert alert-danger fade in' role='alert'><i class='fa fa-warning alert-danger'></i><span id='err-free-crs'>Specified email is already registered. Please provide another email.</span></div>");
}else if(resp.tk_valid == "no") {
jQuery('input[type="submit"]').attr('disabled', false);
jQuery("#nw-error-free-crs").css("display","block");
jQuery('#nw-error-free-crs').html("<div class='alert alert-danger fade in' role='alert'><i class='fa fa-warning alert-danger'></i><span id='err-free-crs'>Error Occurred. Please refresh the page and try again.</span></div>");
}
} else {
if(resp.tk_valid == "yes") {
jQuery('#email-form-free-crs').css("display","none");
jQuery('input[type="submit"]').attr('disabled', false);
jQuery("#nw-error-free-crs").css("display","block");
jQuery('#nw-error-free-crs').html("<div class='alert alert-success fade in' role='alert'><i class='fa fa-check-circle alert-success'></i><span id='err-free-crs'>Registration for Free Trial successful. Please check your email for login details.</span></div>");
window.location.href = "https://www.educba.com/my-courses/index.php";
} else {
jQuery('input[type="submit"]').attr('disabled', false);
jQuery("#nw-error-free-crs").css("display","block");
jQuery('#nw-error-free-crs').html("<div class='alert alert-danger fade in' role='alert'><i class='fa fa-warning alert-danger'></i><span id='err-free-crs'>Error Occurred. Please refresh teh page and try again..</span></div>");
}
}
}
});
}
});
}
return false;
e.preventDefault();
});	
});
</script>

<script>
	var redirect_url  = "https://www.educba.com/cart/";
	
jQuery('#frmuser').on("submit", function(e){

semail = encodeURIComponent(jQuery("#shopemail").val());
//smob = jQuery("#shopmob").val();
jQuery(".loadr-bn").css("display","block");
if(semail){
	
var fregt = jQuery("#fcdp-trs-shc").val();
jQuery.ajax({
type : "POST",
dataType: "json",
cache: false,
url  : 'https://www.educba.com/edb_jx/gtk_fregtk.php',
data: 't=' + fregt,
async: true,
success : function(response){
	jQuery("#fcdp-trs-shc").attr("value",response.tk);
	fregt = jQuery("#fcdp-trs-shc").val();
	
jQuery.ajax({
	type : "POST",
	url  : 'https://www.educba.com/cart/modules/add-email.php',
	data : 'semail='+semail + '&t=' + fregt,
	dataType: "json",
	async: true,
	cache: false,
	success : function(msgr){
		jQuery(".loadr-bn").css("display","none");
		if(msgr.updated == "Yes"){
			jQuery("#err-msgx").css("display","none"); 
			jQuery("#frmuser .errmsg").html("");
			
		window.location.href = redirect_url;
		}else{
			if(msgr.eml_error == "yes"){
			jQuery("#err-msgx").css("display","block");
			jQuery("#frmuser .errmsg").html("Please enter your valid Email ID.");				
			} else {
			jQuery("#err-msgx").css("display","block");
			jQuery("#frmuser .errmsg").html("Error Occurred. Please refresh the page and try again.");
			}
		}
	}
});
}
});
}else{
	jQuery(".loadr-bn").css("display","none");
	jQuery("#err-msgx").css("display","block");
	jQuery("#frmuser .errmsg").html("Please enter your Email.");
}
return false;
e.preventDefault();
});
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
plt = '';
user_envir = '';
jQuery(document).ready(function(){

if( /Android|webOS|iPhone|iPad|iPod|BlackBerry|IEMobile|Opera Mini/i.test(navigator.userAgent) ) {
	plt = "mobile";
	user_envir = encodeURIComponent(navigator.userAgent);
} else {
	plt = "desktop";
	user_envir = encodeURIComponent(navigator.userAgent);
}

jQuery('#form-free-crs').on('submit', function (e) {
jQuery('input[type="submit"]').attr('disabled', true);
jQuery("#loader-free-crs").css("display","block");

uem = encodeURIComponent(jQuery("#nw-email-free-crs").val());
sg = jQuery("#suid-free-crs").val();
var urlx = jQuery("#url-free-crs").val();
zipcode = jQuery("#user-phone-free-crs").val();
mntrm = jQuery("#mn-trm-tx-id").val();
if(jQuery('#nw-mob-free-crs').length){
var mbn = jQuery("#nw-mob-free-crs").val();
}
if(uem == '') {
jQuery("#loader-free-crs").css("display","none");
jQuery('input[type="submit"]').attr('disabled', false);
jQuery("#error-free-crs").css("display","block");
jQuery('#error-free-crs').html("<div class='alert alert-danger fade in' role='alert'><i class='fa fa-warning alert-danger'></i><span id='err-free-crs'>Please enter your email..</span></div>");
} else {
	
var fregt = jQuery("#fcdp-trs").val();
jQuery.ajax({
type : "POST",
dataType: "json",
cache: false,
url  : 'https://www.educba.com/edb_jx/gtk_fregtk.php',
data: 't=' + fregt,
async: true,
success : function(response){
	jQuery("#fcdp-trs").attr("value",response.tk);
	fregt = jQuery("#fcdp-trs").val();
	
jQuery.ajax({
method : "POST",
dataType: "json",
cache: false,
url  : 'https://www.educba.com/ajax/nwz-frz-rgsz.php',
data : 'em=' + uem + '&sgs=' + sg + '&envir=' + plt + '&upf=' + user_envir+'&urlx=' +urlx+'&zipcode='+zipcode+'&mntrm='+mntrm + '&t=' + fregt + '&mb=' + mbn,
async: true,
success : function(resp){
jQuery("#loader-free-crs").css("display","none");
if(resp.access == "no") {
if(resp.eml_error == "yes") {
jQuery('input[type="submit"]').attr('disabled', false);
jQuery("#error-free-crs").css("display","block");
jQuery('#error-free-crs').html("<div class='alert alert-danger fade in' role='alert'><i class='fa fa-warning alert-danger'></i><span id='err-free-crs'>Please enter your valid email (Check your email for spelling mistakes).</span></div>");
}if(resp.mb_error == "yes") {
jQuery('input[type="submit"]').attr('disabled', false);
jQuery("#error-free-crs").css("display","block");
jQuery('#error-free-crs').html("<div class='alert alert-danger fade in' role='alert'><i class='fa fa-warning alert-danger'></i><span id='err-free-crs'>Please enter all the details.</span></div>");
}else if(resp.usr_exists == "yes") {
jQuery('input[type="submit"]').attr('disabled', false);
jQuery("#error-free-crs").css("display","block");
jQuery('#error-free-crs').html("<div class='alert alert-danger fade in' role='alert'><i class='fa fa-warning alert-danger'></i><span id='err-free-crs'>Specified email is already registered. Please provide another email.</span></div>");
}else if(resp.tk_valid == "no") {
jQuery('input[type="submit"]').attr('disabled', false);
jQuery("#error-free-crs").css("display","block");
jQuery('#error-free-crs').html("<div class='alert alert-danger fade in' role='alert'><i class='fa fa-warning alert-danger'></i><span id='err-free-crs'>Error Occurred. Please refresh the page and try again.</span></div>");
}
} else {
if(resp.tk_valid == "yes") {
jQuery('#email-form-free-crs').css("display","none");
jQuery('input[type="submit"]').attr('disabled', false);
jQuery("#error-free-crs").css("display","block");
jQuery('#error-free-crs').html("<div class='alert alert-success fade in' role='alert'><i class='fa fa-check-circle alert-success'></i><span id='err-free-crs'>Registration for Free Trial successful. Please check your email for login details.</span></div>");
window.location.href = "https://www.educba.com/my-courses/index.php";
} else {
jQuery('input[type="submit"]').attr('disabled', false);
jQuery("#error-free-crs").css("display","block");
jQuery('#error-free-crs').html("<div class='alert alert-danger fade in' role='alert'><i class='fa fa-warning alert-danger'></i><span id='err-free-crs'>Error Occurred. Please refresh teh page and try again..</span></div>");
}
}
}
});
}
});
}
return false;
e.preventDefault();
});	
});
</script>


		</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
plt = '';
user_envir = '';
jQuery(document).ready(function(){

if( /Android|webOS|iPhone|iPad|iPod|BlackBerry|IEMobile|Opera Mini/i.test(navigator.userAgent) ) {
	plt = "mobile";
	user_envir = encodeURIComponent(navigator.userAgent);
} else {
	plt = "desktop";
	user_envir = encodeURIComponent(navigator.userAgent);
}

jQuery('#form-free-crs-ext').on('submit', function (e) {
jQuery('input[type="submit"]').attr('disabled', true);
jQuery("#loader-free-crs-ext").css("display","block");

uem = encodeURIComponent(jQuery("#nw-email-free-crs-ext").val());
sg = jQuery("#suid-free-crs-ext").val();
var urlx = jQuery("#url-free-crs-ext").val();
zipcode = jQuery("#user-phone-free-crs-ext").val();
mntrm = jQuery("#mn-trm-tx-id").val();
var spn = jQuery("#spmn").text();
if(jQuery('#nw-mob-free-crs-ext').length){
var mbn = jQuery("#nw-mob-free-crs-ext").val();
}
if(uem == '') {
jQuery("#loader-free-crs-ext").css("display","none");
jQuery('input[type="submit"]').attr('disabled', false);
jQuery("#error-free-crs-ext").css("display","block");
jQuery('#error-free-crs-ext').html("<div class='alert alert-danger fade in' role='alert'><i class='fa fa-warning alert-danger'></i><span id='err-free-crs'>Please enter your email..</span></div>");
} else {
	
var fregt = jQuery("#fcdp-trs-ext").val();
jQuery.ajax({
type : "POST",
dataType: "json",
cache: false,
url  : 'https://www.educba.com/edb_jx/gtk_fregtk.php',
data: 't=' + fregt,
async: true,
success : function(response){
	jQuery("#fcdp-trs-ext").attr("value",response.tk);
	fregt = jQuery("#fcdp-trs-ext").val();
	
jQuery.ajax({
method : "POST",
dataType: "json",
cache: false,
url  : 'https://www.educba.com/ajax/nwz-frz-rgsz.php',
data : 'em=' + uem + '&sgs=' + sg + '&envir=' + plt + '&upf=' + user_envir+'&urlx=' +urlx+'&zipcode='+zipcode+'&mntrm='+mntrm + '&t=' + fregt + '&mb=' + mbn + '&sp=' + spn,
async: true,
success : function(resp){
jQuery("#loader-free-crs-ext").css("display","none");
if(resp.access == "no") {
if(resp.eml_error == "yes") {
jQuery('input[type="submit"]').attr('disabled', false);
jQuery("#error-free-crs-ext").css("display","block");
jQuery('#error-free-crs-ext').html("<div class='alert alert-danger fade in' role='alert'><i class='fa fa-warning alert-danger'></i><span id='err-free-crs'>Please enter your valid email (Check your email for spelling mistakes).</span></div>");
}else if(resp.mb_error == "yes") {
jQuery('input[type="submit"]').attr('disabled', false);
jQuery("#error-free-crs-ext").css("display","block");
jQuery('#error-free-crs-ext').html("<div class='alert alert-danger fade in' role='alert'><i class='fa fa-warning alert-danger'></i><span id='err-free-crs'>Please enter all the details.</span></div>");
}else if(resp.usr_exists == "yes") {
jQuery('input[type="submit"]').attr('disabled', false);
jQuery("#error-free-crs-ext").css("display","block");
jQuery('#error-free-crs-ext').html("<div class='alert alert-danger fade in' role='alert'><i class='fa fa-warning alert-danger'></i><span id='err-free-crs'>Specified email is already registered. Please provide another email.</span></div>");
}else if(resp.tk_valid == "no") {
jQuery('input[type="submit"]').attr('disabled', false);
jQuery("#error-free-crs-ext").css("display","block");
jQuery('#error-free-crs-ext').html("<div class='alert alert-danger fade in' role='alert'><i class='fa fa-warning alert-danger'></i><span id='err-free-crs'>Error Occurred. Please refresh the page and try again.</span></div>");
}
} else {
if(resp.tk_valid == "yes") {
jQuery('#email-form-free-crs').css("display","none");
jQuery('input[type="submit"]').attr('disabled', false);
jQuery("#error-free-crs-ext").css("display","block");

}
}
}
});
}
});
}
return false;
e.preventDefault();

<script>
jQuery(document).ready(function(){
var loader = jQuery(".loader_edqn");
loader.show();
 
function getNextQuestion(){
jQuery.ajax({
		type : "GET",
		url  : 'https://www.educba.com/ajax/get-questions.php',
		data: jQuery("#frm_q").serialize(),
		dataType: "json",
		cache: false,
		async: true 
	}).done(function(response) {
		console.log(response);
		if(response.status == "Yes"){
		
		var currentq = jQuery("#questionno").val();
		++currentq;
		jQuery("#cnt").html(currentq);
		jQuery("#questionno").val(currentq);
		jQuery("#qid").val(response.qid);
		
		jQuery("#qns").html(response.question);
		var options ="";
		if(response.options != "No"){
			jQuery.each(response.options, function(index, element) {
				options += "<li> <input type='radio' class='uk-radio' id='opt-"+(index+1)+"' name='radio' value='"+(index+1)+"' required>  <label for='opt-"+(index+1)+"'>"+element+"</label></li>";
			});
			
		}
		jQuery("#rad_itemss").html(options);
		
		if(response.display_result == "Yes"){
			jQuery(".qns, .ans, #qsolution, #nxt-q, #submit-q").hide();
			jQuery("#qresult, #tviewmore").show();
			var qtot = jQuery("#questionno").val() - 1;
			var qcor = jQuery("#cor_ans").val();
			var qwro = jQuery("#wro_ans").val();
			jQuery("#qtot").html(qtot);
			jQuery("#qcor").html(qcor);
			jQuery("#qwro").html(qwro);
			jQuery("#qper").html(((qcor / qtot) * 100)+"%");
			console.log("Display result");
		}
		jQuery("#qsolution").html("");
		}else{
			//jQuery("#edt_error").html("No Quiz Availble").addClass("wro-ans").show(); loader.hide();
		}
		loader.hide();
	}).fail(function(err) {  loader.hide(); control.log(err) });
	
}
//on page load 
getNextQuestion();

//Fetch next Question
jQuery(document).on('click', '#nxt-q', function(evt){
	loader.show();
	getNextQuestion();
	jQuery("#submit-q").show();
	jQuery("#nxt-q").hide();
	evt.preventDefault();
});

//Evaluate Question
jQuery(document).on('click', '#submit-q', function(evt){
	loader.show();
	jQuery("#edt_error").html("").hide();
	var getSelectedValue = jQuery('input[name="radio"]:checked');   
    //console.log("value : "+ JSON.stringify(getSelectedValue));
    if(getSelectedValue.length != 0) {
         
	if(jQuery("#qid").val() == ''){
		jQuery("#edt_error").html("<p>Something went wrong !</p>").addClass("wro-ans").show(); loader.hide();
	}else{
	jQuery.ajax({
		type : "GET",
		url  : 'https://www.educba.com/ajax/get-answer.php',
		data: jQuery("#frm_q").serialize(),
		dataType: "json",
		cache: false,
		async: true 
	}).done(function(response) {
		if(response.status == "Yes"){
		var user_ans = jQuery('input[name="radio"]:checked').val();
		var correct_ans = response.cor_opt;
		jQuery("#opt-"+correct_ans).parent().addClass("cor-ans").append(" <span class='cor-ans-badge'>&check;</span>");
		jQuery("#qsolution").html("<br><span class='green-txt'>Solution : </span>"+response.solution);
		
		if(user_ans == correct_ans){
			var temp = jQuery("#cor_ans").val(); ++temp;
			jQuery("#cor_ans").val(temp);
		}else{
			var temp = jQuery("#wro_ans").val(); ++temp;
			jQuery("#wro_ans").val(temp);
			jQuery("#opt-"+user_ans).parent().addClass("wro-ans").append(" <span class='wro-ans-badge'>x</span>");
		}
		jQuery("#nxt-q").show();
		jQuery("#submit-q").hide();
		
		}
		loader.hide();
	}).fail(function(err) {  loader.hide(); console.log(err) });
	}
	
	} else {
        jQuery("#edt_error").html("Please select the option").addClass("wro-ans").show(); loader.hide();
    } 
	evt.preventDefault();
});

});
</script> 

	
		</div>


				

				            <button type="button" class="pum-close popmake-close" aria-label="Close">
			X            </button>
		
	</div>

</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
jQuery(document).ready(function() {
jQuery(window).scroll(function() {
var header = jQuery('.site-header').outerHeight();
var scroll = jQuery( window ).scrollTop();

	
if ( scroll >= header ) {
jQuery( '.custom-logo' ).attr("srcset","https://cdn.educba.com/images/website_logo_transparent_background.png");
} else {
jQuery( '.custom-logo' ).attr("srcset","https://cdn.educba.com/images/website_logo_transparent_background_white.png");
}	

	if (window.matchMedia('(max-width: 768px)').matches) {
		
    if (jQuery(window).scrollTop() > 100) {
        jQuery(".site-footer .back-to-top").fadeIn('slow');
    }
    else {        
		jQuery(".site-footer .back-to-top").fadeOut('slow');
    }
}
});

//jQuery(".custom-logo").attr("data-no-lazy","1");
jQuery(".custom-logo-link").prop("href","https://www.educba.com/data-science/");

var hdev = '';
if( /Android|webOS|iPhone|iPad|iPod|BlackBerry|IEMobile|Opera Mini/i.test(navigator.userAgent) ) {
	hdev = "m";
}
var cookiehpValue = "";
function myOffer_id() {
    jQuery("#topbar_id").css("display","none");
    jQuery(".site-header").css("top", "unset")
}
	
jQuery(document).on("click", "#bar-close-id", function() {
	jQuery("#topbar_id").css("display", "none"),
	Cookies.set("bannerhpshown", "yes", {
		expires: 1
	});
});
	
jQuery(window).scroll(function() {
if(jQuery('#topbar_id').length){
if(jQuery(window).scrollTop() >= 100) {
	jQuery("#topbar_id").css("display", "none");
	jQuery("header.site-header.fixed.shrink").css("top", "unset");
} else {
	cookiehpValue = Cookies.get("bannerhpshown");
	if(cookiehpValue == null) {
	jQuery("#topbar_id").css("display", "block");
	if(hdev == '') {
	jQuery(".site-header").css("top", "2.25em");
	}
	} else {
		jQuery(".site-header").css("top", "unset");
	}
}
}
});

		jQuery("#nw-email-fx-et").after("<input type='text' class='uk-input' placeholder='Enter your contact number' name='nw-mob-fx' id='nw-mob-fx' value=''>");

			jQuery("#topbar_id").css("display", "block");

jQuery(document).ready(function () {
	if(jQuery("#breadcrumbs span:eq(3)").length) {
		var ct_nm = jQuery("#breadcrumbs span:eq(3) a:eq(0)").text();
	} else {
		var ct_nm = "https://www.educba.com/fuzzy-logic-system/";
		ct_nm = encodeURIComponent(ct_nm);
	}
	 jQuery.ajax({
			type : "POST",
			url  : "https://www.educba.com/ajax/sv_cat.php",
			data: 'ct=Blog - ' + ct_nm,
			async: true,

	   });

<script>function hide(target) {
document.getElementById(target).style.display = 'none';
}
</script>
<link href="https://cdn.educba.com/ajax/js/jquery.countdown2.css" data-rocket-async="style" as="style" onload="this.onload=null;this.rel='stylesheet'" rel="preload" />
<script src="https://www.educba.com/ajax/js/jquery.countdown2n.js" defer></script>
<script type="text/javascript">
ts = (new Date()).getTime() + 38250000;
var time_rem;
	jQuery.ajax({
	method: "GET",
	url: "https://www.educba.com/wmj_jx/customised-timer.php",
	dataType: "json",
	cache: false,
	success: function (result) {
	if(result.status == 'Yes'){
		time_rem = (result.remaining_time * 1000);

ts = (new Date()).getTime() + time_rem;
//OFFERBAR TIMER
newYear = false;
jQuery('#countjop1').countdown({
timestamp	: ts,
callback	: function(days, hours, minutes, seconds){ console.log("IFFN");
}
});
		
// header yellow bar timer
		
jQuery('#top_bar_timer').countdown({
timestamp	: ts,
callback	: function(days, hours, minutes, seconds){
}
});
		
tmpts = ts;
jQuery('#countjop2').countdown({
timestamp	: tmpts,
callback	: function(days, hours, minutes, seconds){
}
});

jQuery('#countdown1za').countdown({
timestamp	: ts,
callback	: function(days, hours, minutes, seconds){
}
});

jQuery('#countdown2').countdown({
timestamp	: ts,
callback	: function(days, hours, minutes, seconds){
}
});

jQuery('#countjop_aio2').countdown({
timestamp	: ts,
callback	: function(days, hours, minutes, seconds){
}
});

jQuery('#top-bar-lmt-off').countdown({
timestamp	: ts,
callback	: function(days, hours, minutes, seconds){
}
});
	}else{

	                <div class="td-login-inputs"><input class="td-login-input" type="password" name="login_pass" id="login_pass-mob" value="" required><label>your password</label></div>
	                <input type="button" name="login_button" id="login_button-mob" class="td-login-button" value="LOG IN">
	                <div class="td-login-info-text">
	                <a href="#" id="forgot-pass-link-mob">Forgot your password?</a>
	                </div>
	                <div class="td-login-register-link">
	                
	                </div>
	                
	                

                </div>
            </div>

	            </div>

    <div class="td-container td-post-template-2">
        <article id="post-5072" class="post-5072 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail category-artificial-intelligence category-research-areas" itemscope itemtype="https://schema.org/Article">
            <div class="td-pb-row">
                <div class="td-pb-span12">
                    <div class="td-post-header">
                        <div class="td-crumb-container"><div class="entry-crumbs"><span><a title="" class="entry-crumb" href="https://urisharora.com/">Home</a></span> <i class="td-icon-right td-bread-sep"></i> <span><a title="View all posts in Artificial Intelligence" class="entry-crumb" href="https://urisharora.com/category/artificial-intelligence/">Artificial Intelligence</a></span> <i class="td-icon-right td-bread-sep td-bred-no-url-last"></i> <span class="td-bred-no-url-last">What is Fuzzy Logic in AI and What are its Applications?</span></div></div>

                        <ul class="td-category"><li class="entry-category"><a  href="https://urisharora.com/category/artificial-intelligence/">Artificial Intelligence</a></li><li class="entry-category"><a  href="https://urisharora.com/category/research-areas/">Research Areas</a></li></ul>
                        <header class="td-post-title">
                            <h1 class="entry-title">What is Fuzzy Logic in AI and What are its Applications?</h1>

                            

                            <div class="td-module-meta-info">
                                <div class="td-post-author-name"><div class="td-author-by">By</div> <a href="https://urisharora.com/author/urisharora/">Urish Arora</a><div class="td-author-line"> - </div> </div>                                <span class="td-post-date"><time class="entry-date updated td-module-date" datetime="2021-07-21T11:46:28+00:00" >July 21, 2021</time></span>                                <div class="td-post-views"><i class="td-icon-views"></i><span class="td-nr-views-5072">1142</span></div>                                <div class="td-post-comments"><a href="https://urisharora.com/2021/07/what-is-fuzzy-logic-in-ai-and-what-are-its-applications/#respond"><i class="td-icon-comments"></i>0</a></div>                            </div>

                        </header>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div> <!-- /.td-pb-row -->

            <div class="td-pb-row">
                                            <div class="td-pb-span8 td-main-content" role="main">
                                <div class="td-ss-main-content">
                                    
        <div class="td-post-sharing-top"><div id="td_social_sharing_article_top" class="td-post-sharing td-ps-bg td-ps-notext td-post-sharing-style1 "><div class="td-post-sharing-visible"><a class="td-social-sharing-button td-social-sharing-button-js td-social-network td-social-facebook" href="https://www.facebook.com/sharer.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Furisharora.com%2F2021%2F07%2Fwhat-is-fuzzy-logic-in-ai-and-what-are-its-applications%2F">
                                        <div class="td-social-but-icon"><i class="td-icon-facebook"></i></div>
                                        <div class="td-social-but-text">Facebook</div>
                                    </a><a class="td-social-sharing-button td-social-sharing-button-js td-social-network td-social-twitter" href="https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=What+is+Fuzzy+Logic+in+AI+and+What+are+its+Applications%3F&url=https%3A%2F%2Furisharora.com%2F2021%2F07%2Fwhat-is-fuzzy-logic-in-ai-and-what-are-its-applications%2F&via=UrishArora.com">
                                        <div class="td-social-but-icon"><i class="td-icon-twitter"></i></div>
                                        <div class="td-social-but-text">Twitter</div>
                                    </a><a class="td-social-sharing-button td-social-sharing-button-js td-social-network td-social-pinterest" href="https://pinterest.com/pin/create/button/?url=https://urisharora.com/2021/07/what-is-fuzzy-logic-in-ai-and-what-are-its-applications/&amp;media=https://urisharora.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/07/What-is-Fuzzy-Logic-in-AI-and-What-are-its-Applications.png&description=What+is+Fuzzy+Logic+in+AI+and+What+are+its+Applications%3F">
                                        <div class="td-social-but-icon"><i class="td-icon-pinterest"></i></div>
                                        <div class="td-social-but-text">Pinterest</div>
                                    </a><a class="td-social-sharing-button td-social-sharing-button-js td-social-network td-social-whatsapp" href="whatsapp://send?text=What+is+Fuzzy+Logic+in+AI+and+What+are+its+Applications%3F %0A%0A https://urisharora.com/2021/07/what-is-fuzzy-logic-in-ai-and-what-are-its-applications/">
                                        <div class="td-social-but-icon"><i class="td-icon-whatsapp"></i></div>
                                        <div class="td-social-but-text">WhatsApp</div>
                                    </a></div><div class="td-social-sharing-hidden"><ul class="td-pulldown-filter-list"></ul><a class="td-social-sharing-button td-social-handler td-social-expand-tabs" href="#" data-block-uid="td_social_sharing_article_top">
                                    <div class="td-social-but-icon"><i class="td-icon-plus td-social-expand-tabs-icon"></i></div>
                                </a></div></div></div>

        <div class="td-post-content">
            <div class="td-post-featured-image"><a href="https://i0.wp.com/urisharora.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/07/What-is-Fuzzy-Logic-in-AI-and-What-are-its-Applications.png?fit=700%2C418&ssl=1" data-caption=""><img width="696" height="416" class="entry-thumb td-modal-image" src="https://i0.wp.com/urisharora.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/07/What-is-Fuzzy-Logic-in-AI-and-What-are-its-Applications.png?resize=696%2C416&ssl=1" srcset="https://i0.wp.com/urisharora.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/07/What-is-Fuzzy-Logic-in-AI-and-What-are-its-Applications.png?w=700&ssl=1 700w, https://i0.wp.com/urisharora.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/07/What-is-Fuzzy-Logic-in-AI-and-What-are-its-Applications.png?resize=300%2C179&ssl=1 300w, https://i0.wp.com/urisharora.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/07/What-is-Fuzzy-Logic-in-AI-and-What-are-its-Applications.png?resize=696%2C416&ssl=1 696w, https://i0.wp.com/urisharora.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/07/What-is-Fuzzy-Logic-in-AI-and-What-are-its-Applications.png?resize=600%2C358&ssl=1 600w" sizes="(max-width: 696px) 100vw, 696px" alt="" title="What is Fuzzy Logic in AI and What are its Applications"/></a></div>
            
<p>Fuzzy Logic (FL) is a method of reasoning that resembles human reasoning. fuzzy logic is used to imitate human reasoning and cognition that involves all intermediate possibilities between digital values YES and NO.</p>



<p>In the Boolean system, only two possibilities (0 and 1) exist, where 1 denotes the absolute truth value and 0 denotes the absolute false value. But in the fuzzy system, there are multiple possibilities present between the 0 and 1, which are partially false and partially true.</p>



<div class="wp-block-image"><figure class="aligncenter size-full is-resized"><img src="https://i0.wp.com/urisharora.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/07/Is-it-Cold1.png?resize=500%2C418&#038;ssl=1" alt="" class="wp-image-5080" width="500" height="418" srcset="https://i0.wp.com/urisharora.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/07/Is-it-Cold1.png?w=500&amp;ssl=1 500w, https://i0.wp.com/urisharora.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/07/Is-it-Cold1.png?resize=300%2C251&amp;ssl=1 300w" sizes="(max-width: 500px) 100vw, 500px" data-recalc-dims="1" /></figure></div>



<p>The Fuzzy logic was invented by <strong>Lotfi Zadeh</strong> who observed that unlike computers, humans have a different range of possibilities between YES and NO, such as:</p>



<p>The Fuzzy logic can be implemented in systems such as micro-controllers, workstation-based or large network-based systems for achieving the definite output. It can also be implemented in both hardware or software.</p>



<h2>Characteristics of Fuzzy Logic:</h2>



<ul><li>Flexible and we can easily implement it.</li><li>Helping the minimization of the logic created by the human.</li><li>It always offers two values, which represent two possible solution.</li><li>In fuzzy logic, everything is a matter of degree.</li><li>In the Fuzzy logic, any system which is logical can be easily fuzzified.</li><li>It is based on natural language processing.</li><li>It is also used by the quantitative analysts for improving their algorithm&#8217;s execution.</li><li>It also allows users to integrate with the programming.</li></ul>



<h2><strong>Architecture of a Fuzzy Logic System</strong>:</h2>



<p>In the architecture of the <strong>Fuzzy Logic</strong> system, each component plays an important role. The architecture consists of the different four components which are given below.</p>



<p>Rule Base</p>



<p>Inference Engine</p>



<p>Fuzzification</p>



<p>Defuzzification</p>



<figure class="wp-block-image size-full"><img loading="lazy" width="696" height="416" src="https://i0.wp.com/urisharora.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/07/Rules1.png?resize=696%2C416&#038;ssl=1" alt="" class="wp-image-5083" srcset="https://i0.wp.com/urisharora.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/07/Rules1.png?w=700&amp;ssl=1 700w, https://i0.wp.com/urisharora.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/07/Rules1.png?resize=300%2C179&amp;ssl=1 300w, https://i0.wp.com/urisharora.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/07/Rules1.png?resize=696%2C416&amp;ssl=1 696w, https://i0.wp.com/urisharora.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/07/Rules1.png?resize=600%2C358&amp;ssl=1 600w" sizes="(max-width: 696px) 100vw, 696px" data-recalc-dims="1" /></figure>



<p><strong>Rule Base:</strong>It contains all the rules and the if-then conditions offered by the experts to control the decision-making system.There are so many updates that come in the Fuzzy theory recently, which offers effective methods for designing and tuning of fuzzy controllers. These updates or developments decreases the number of fuzzy set of rules.</p>



<p><strong> Inference Engine: </strong>It simulates the human reasoning process by making fuzzy inference on the inputs and IF-THEN rules.According to the input field, it will decide the rules that are to be fired. Combining the fired rules, form the control actions.</p>



<p> <strong>Fuzzification:</strong>It transforms the system inputs, which are crisp numbers, into fuzzy sets. It splits the input signal into five steps such as −</p>



<ul><li>Large Positive (LP)</li><li>Medium Positive (MP)</li><li>Small (S)</li><li>Medium Negative (MN)</li><li>Large negative (LN)</li></ul>



<p><strong>Defuzzification</strong>:The Defuzzification process converts the fuzzy sets into a crisp value. There are different types of techniques available, and you need to select the best-suited one with an expert system.</p>



<p><strong>Membership Function</strong></p>



<p>Membership functions allow you to quantify linguistic term and represent a fuzzy set graphically. A membership function for a fuzzy <em>set A</em> on the universe of discourse X is defined as μ<sub>A</sub>:X → [0,1].</p>



<p>Here, each element of <em>X</em> is mapped to a value between 0 and 1. It is called membership value or degree of membership. It quantifies the degree of membership of the element in <em>X</em> to the fuzzy set <em>A</em>.</p>



<ul><li>x axis represents the universe of discourse.</li><li>y axis represents the degrees of membership in the [0, 1] interval.</li></ul>



<p>There can be multiple membership functions applicable to fuzzify a numerical value. Simple membership functions are used as use of complex functions does not add more precision in the output.</p>



<h2><strong>Applications of Fuzzy Logic</strong>:</h2>



<p>Various types of AI systems and technologies use fuzzy logic</p>



<ul><li>In automobiles, fuzzy logic is used for gear selection and is based on factors such as engine load, road conditions and style of driving.</li><li>In copy machines, fuzzy logic is used to adjust drum voltage based on factors such as humidity, picture density and temperature.</li><li>In aerospace, fuzzy logic is used to manage altitude control for satellites and spacecrafts based on environmental factors.</li><li>In medicine, fuzzy logic is used for computer-aided diagnoses, based on factors such as symptoms and medical history.</li><li>In chemical distillation, fuzzy logic is used to control pH and temperature variables.</li><li>In natural language processing, fuzzy logic is used to determine semantic relations between concepts represented by words and other linguistic variables.</li></ul>



<h2>Advantages of Fuzzy Logic System:</h2>



<ul><li>Fuzzy logic is widely used for commercial and practical purposes</li><li>It does not need a large memory, because the algorithms can be easily described with fewer data.</li><li>Fuzzy logic in AI helps you to control machines and consumer products</li><li>It can be programmed to in the situation when feedback sensor stops working</li><li>The development time of fuzzy logic is short as compared to conventional methods.</li><li>It can easily be modified to improve or alter system performance</li><li>Due to its flexibility, any user can easily add and delete rules in the FLS system.</li></ul>



<h2><strong>Disadvantages of Fuzzy Logic</strong>:</h2>



<ul><li>The run time of fuzzy logic systems is slow and takes a long time to produce output</li><li>Fuzzy logic is not always accurate. So Fuzzy logic are not suitable for those problems that require high accuracy.</li><li>The systems of a Fuzzy logic need a lot of testing for verification and validation.</li><li>Setting exact, fuzzy rules and, membership functions is a difficult task</li><li>Validation and Verification of a fuzzy knowledge-based system needs extensive testing with hardware</li></ul>



<p></p>
<h4 class="block-title td-block-title"><span class="td-pulldown-size">About Urish Arora</span></h4>
 
 <p> Urish Arora is a Digital Transformation Expert and an independent consultant. 	<div class="td-block-span12">

        <div class="td_module_4 td_module_wrap td-animation-stack">
            <div class="td-module-image">
                <div class="td-module-thumb"><a href="https://urisharora.com/2020/02/digital-marketing-strategies-for-2020/" rel="bookmark" class="td-image-wrap" title="Digital Marketing Strategies for 2020"><img class="entry-thumb" src="data:image/png;base64,iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAAUQAAADrAQMAAAArGX0KAAAAA1BMVEWurq51dlI4AAAAAXRSTlMmkutdmwAAACBJREFUaN7twTEBAAAAwiD7pzbEXmAAAAAAAAAAAACQHSaOAAGSp1GBAAAAAElFTkSuQmCC" alt="digital-marketing-strategies-for-2020" title="Digital Marketing Strategies for 2020" data-type="image_tag" data-img-url="https://i0.wp.com/urisharora.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/digital-marketing-strategies-for-2020.png?resize=324%2C235&ssl=1"  width="324" height="235" /></a></div>                <a href="https://urisharora.com/category/digital-marketing/" class="td-post-category">Digital Marketing</a>            </div>

            <h3 class="entry-title td-module-title"><a href="https://urisharora.com/2020/02/digital-marketing-strategies-for-2020/" rel="bookmark" title="Digital Marketing Strategies for 2020">Digital Marketing Strategies for 2020</a></h3>
            <div class="td-module-meta-info">
                <span class="td-post-author-name"><a href="https://urisharora.com/author/urisharora/">Urish Arora</a> <span>-</span> </span>                <span class="td-post-date"><time class="entry-date updated td-module-date" datetime="2020-02-09T19:11:00+00:00" >February 9, 2020</time></span>                <span class="td-module-comments"><a href="https://urisharora.com/2020/02/digital-marketing-strategies-for-2020/#respond">0</a></span>            </div>

            <div class="td-excerpt">
                
Digital Marketing Strategies are one hot topic for 2020 as getting traffic to your websites can make you rich. Yes, there are...            </div>

            
        </div>

        
	</div> <!-- ./td-block-span12 -->

	<div class="td-block-span12">

        <div class="td_module_6 td_module_wrap td-animation-stack">

var gtm_loaded = false;
var gtm_not_loaded_data = {"gtm_data":[]};
function downloadGaAtOnload() {
    //GTM init
    var delay = (!isNaN(GTM_PAGE_DELAY_CONFIG))?GTM_PAGE_DELAY_CONFIG:0;
    setTimeout(function() {
        gtmLoadScript();
        gtm_loaded = true;
        sendGTMData();
    }, delay);
}
        
if (window.addEventListener)
    window.addEventListener("load", downloadGaAtOnload, false);
else if (window.attachEvent)
    window.attachEvent("onload", downloadGaAtOnload);
else window.onload = downloadGaAtOnload;
    
function gtmLoadScript() {
    (function(w, d, s, l, i) {
        w[l] = w[l] || [];
        w[l].push({'gtm.start':new Date().getTime(),
                    event: 'gtm.js'});
        var f = d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0],
                j = d.createElement(s), dl = l != 'user_params' ? '&l=' + l : '';
        j.async = true;
        j.rel = 'dns-prefetch';
        j.src ='//www.googletagmanager.com/gtm.js?id=' + i + dl;
        f.parentNode.insertBefore(j, f);
    })(window, document, 'script', 'dataLayer','GTM-MQVFZMQ');
}
function dataPushInTagManager(event , eventCategory , eventAction , eventLabel , userId){
        // send conversion data to algolia
        if(typeof sendAlgoliaConversion === "function" && eventCategory == "LeadSignup"){
            sendAlgoliaConversion('LeadSignup - ' + eventAction);
        }

        if(eventLabel == "undefined" || eventLabel == " "){
            eventLabel = $(location).attr("href");
        }
        if(userId == null){
            if(!gtm_loaded){
              gtm_not_loaded_data['gtm_data'].push({
                'event': event,
                'eventCategory':eventCategory,
                'eventAction':eventAction,
                'eventLabel':eventLabel,
                }); 
            }else{
                dataLayer.push({
                'event': event,
                'eventCategory':eventCategory,
                'eventAction':eventAction,
                'eventLabel':eventLabel,
                });
            }
        }else{
            if(!gtm_loaded){
              gtm_not_loaded_data['gtm_data'].push({
                'event': event,
                'eventCategory':eventCategory,
                'eventAction':eventAction,
                'eventLabel':eventLabel,
                'userId':userId
                }); 
            }else{
                dataLayer.push({
                'event': event,
                'eventCategory':eventCategory,
                'eventAction':eventAction,
                'eventLabel':eventLabel,
                'userId':userId
                });
            }

            // fire ViewCourse manually with LeadSignup event and userId is present
            if(eventCategory === "LeadSignup"){
                eventCategory = "ViewCourse";
                eventAction = "PageLoad";
                if(!gtm_loaded){
                    gtm_not_loaded_data['gtm_data'].push({
                        'event': event,
                        'eventCategory':eventCategory,
                        'eventAction':eventAction,
                        'eventLabel':eventLabel,
                        'userId':userId
                    }); 
                }else{
                    dataLayer.push({
                        'event': event,
                        'eventCategory':eventCategory,
                        'eventAction':eventAction,
                        'eventLabel':eventLabel,
                        'userId':userId
                    });
                }
            }
        }
}
function dataPushInTagManagerPurchase(postorderinfo) {

    if(document.getElementById('dataPushInTagManagerPurchase').value == 0){
       document.getElementById('dataPushInTagManagerPurchase').value = 1;
       if(!gtm_loaded){
                    gtm_not_loaded_data['gtm_data'].push({
            'event': 'transactionComplete',
            'ecommerce': {
                'currencyCode': postorderinfo.currency,
                'purchase': {
                    'actionField':
                            {
                                'id': postorderinfo.orderid,
    // Transaction ID. Required for purchases.
                                'revenue': postorderinfo.final_value,
    // Total transaction value (incl. tax and shipping)
                                'tax':  postorderinfo.servicetax_value,
    // if any else 0
                                'shipping': 0,
    // if any else 0
                            },
                    'products': [{
                            'name': postorderinfo.courseAnalyticTitle, // COURSE NAME
                            'id': postorderinfo.courseid,
    // COURSE ID
                            'price':  postorderinfo.original_value,
    // COURSE PRICE
                            'quantity': 1,
                        }, ]
                }
            }
        }); 
        }else{
        dataLayer.push({
            'event': 'transactionComplete',
            'ecommerce': {
                'currencyCode': postorderinfo.currency,
                'purchase': {
                    'actionField':
                            {
                                'id': postorderinfo.orderid,
    // Transaction ID. Required for purchases.
                                'revenue': postorderinfo.final_value,
    // Total transaction value (incl. tax and shipping)
                                'tax':  postorderinfo.servicetax_value,
    // if any else 0
                                'shipping': 0,
    // if any else 0
                            },
                    'products': [{
                            'name': postorderinfo.courseAnalyticTitle, // COURSE NAME
                            'id': postorderinfo.courseid,
    // COURSE ID
                            'price':  postorderinfo.original_value,
    // COURSE PRICE
                            'quantity': 1,
                        }, ]
                }
            }
        });
        }
    }
}
function sendGTMData(){
   if(gtm_loaded){
        if(Object.keys(gtm_not_loaded_data.gtm_data).length != 0){
            for(var key in gtm_not_loaded_data.gtm_data){
                 dataLayer.push(gtm_not_loaded_data.gtm_data[key]);
            }
        }
   }
}

                        5 Ratings
                    </span>

                <div class="info">
                    <span class="mobile">Upskill yourself with the world's top-rated Post Graduate Diploma in AI and Machine Learning. These AI ML certification courses will help you learn Python, Predictive Analytics, ML, Deep Learning, Natural Language Processing(NLP), Sequence Learning, etc.</span>
                    <span class="desktop">Upskill yourself with the world's top-rated Post Graduate Diploma in AI and Machine Learning. This Artificial Intelligence course online will help you learn Python, Predictive Analytics, ML, Deep Learning, Natural Language Processing(NLP), Sequence Learning, etc. This AI certification course provides hands-on experience on 20+ industry &nbsp;projects, 100+ case studies.                                         <p class="about_info">
                        E&ICT Academy, NIT Warangal, and Edureka have collaborated to create this Post Graduate Diploma in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning. <b>NIT Warangal is ranked among the top 5 NITs in India by MHRD</b> and recognized as an Institute of national importance by the Govt. of India.
                    </p>
                    <p class="about_info">
                        These Artificial Intelligence Course online will nurture and transform you into a highly skilled professional, thus helping you land a high-paying AIML job. Get hands-on exposure to industry-level assignments and projects with this top-notch AI ML course.                    </p>

</section><section class="advantage_pgp_v2" id="WhyEdureka">
        <div class="container edureka_advantage sec_scroll" id = "edureka_advantage" data-gaSelector="edu_adv_sec" style=''>
        <!--<div id = 'adv_sec'>-->
        <h2 class="pgp_com_title">The Edureka Advantage</h2>
        <div class="row advantages_table">
            <table>
                <thead>
                <th class="purple">WHAT I NEED</th>
                <th class="green">EDUREKA ADVANTAGE</th>
                <th class="red">WHAT OTHERS OFFER</th>
                </thead>
                <tbody>
                                        <tr>
                        <td class="content_purple">
                            <b>Practical Knowledge</b> and exposure relevant to the current industry/job needs                        </td>
                        <td class="content_green">
                            <div>
                                <i class="icon-right_tick"></i>
                                Live instructor-led online classes by industry experts                            </div>
                        </td>
                        <td class="content_red">

        <div class="slide_assist">
                            <div class="assist_slide_bx">
                    <div class="image_slide">
                        <img width="457" height="343" class="lazyImages" data-src="pgp_webinars__1603443504.jpg" fullBase="true" alt="">
                    </div>
                                        <div class="slide_info">
                                                    <div class="title">Live Career Launch Webinar</div>
                            <div class="batch_start"><i class="icon-calender"></i> 1 week before the batch starts</div>
                            <div class="info">In the Artificial Intelligence course webinar, you will have a complete curriculum and career services walkthrough, conducted even before the actual curriculum starts. To prepare the learner on what to expect from the program and help them understand their AI ML courses objectives.</div>
                                                    <div class="title">AI ML Career-Oriented Webinars</div>
                            <div class="batch_start"><i class="icon-calender"></i> Month 1 to Month 9</div>
                            <div class="info">In our AI ML courses, you will have over 20+ live and interactive webinar sessions with an industry expert to gain knowledge, insights, and experience from a seasoned career mentor on developing self-awareness and understanding of the expectations of a hiring manager.</div>
                                            </div>
                                    </div> 
                            <div class="assist_slide_bx">
                    <div class="image_slide">
                        <img width="457" height="343" class="lazyImages" data-src="pgp_webinars__1603443517.jpg" fullBase="true" alt="">
                    </div>
                                        <div class="slide_info">
                                                    <div class="title">Leadership Skill Development Sessions</div>
                            <div class="batch_start"><i class="icon-calender"></i> Month 1 to Month 9</div>
                            <div class="info">In these AI ML certification courses, you will have over 15+ live and interactive recurring sessions with experts spread across 9 months to gauge and help learners develop interpersonal skills such as public speaking, leadership, negotiation, stress management, and more.</div>
                                                    <div class="title">Profile Building Assistance</div>
                            <div class="batch_start"><i class="icon-calender"></i> Month 6</div>
                            <div class="info">In the Artificial Intelligence course online by Edureka, you will get expert tips and advice on creating an attractive and relevant resume and LinkedIn profile that guarantees effectiveness. Includes guidance, hand-holding, feedback up to 3 iterations from a Dedicated Career Coach.</div>
                                            </div>
                                    </div> 
                            <div class="assist_slide_bx">
                    <div class="image_slide">
                        <img width="457" height="343" class="lazyImages" data-src="pgp_webinars__1603442462.jpg" fullBase="true" alt="">
                    </div>
                                        <div class="slide_info">
                                                    <div class="title">Exhaustive Interview Prep</div>
                            <div class="batch_start"><i class="icon-calender"></i> Month 8</div>
                            <div class="info">As the AI ML courses are towards the end, many emphases are laid on how to crack the interviews. A learner will get expert tips, sample technical and non-technical interview questions, and advice on preparing for an AI interview or ML interview.</div>
                                                    <div class="title">Mock Interview Sessions</div>
                            <div class="batch_start"><i class="icon-calender"></i> Month 8</div>
                            <div class="info">In AI and ML courses sessions, the learners can take part in mock interview sessions with industry experts to gain hands-on experience in real-life technical rounds, HR round, and more. Learners will also get constructive feedback and tips from the experts.</div>
                                            </div>
                                    </div> 
                            <div class="assist_slide_bx">

                            <div class="info">In Edureka's PG in Artificial Intelligence Online Course session, you will have one-on-one Career Mentoring sessions on how to develop the right skills and the right attitude to secure a dream job based on a learners’ educational background, previous work experience and future aspirations.
</div>
                                                    <div class="title">Job Search Assistance &amp; Job Feeds</div>

                                             “I have made a smooth transition from electrical engineering to AI-ML domain thanks to Edureka’s Best AI and ML course program in association with E&ICT, NIT Warangal. The knowledge will definitely help me pursue my master's related                                    </p>
                                                                        <a class='success_story_read_more' data-status='more'>Read More</a>
                                    <p class="card-text content read-less hide" style="display:inline"> to computation and data science. The best part about this program is the 24*7 support team which helped me to resolve all my doubts regarding the assignments, tests, and LMS issues. I am happy that I chose this PG Diploma course from Edureka”</p>

<section class="program_curriculum_pgp_v2  sec_scroll" data-gaSelector="curriculum_sec" id="curriculum" style=''>
    <div class="container">
        <div class="row">
            <div class="col-xl-8 col-lg-8 col-md-12 col-sm-12 col-xs-12" id="cur_acc_sec_container">
                <div class="heading">
                    <h2 class="pgp_com_title">Artificial Intelligence Course Curriculum</h2>

</section><section class="admission_process_pgp_v2  sec_scroll" data-gaSelector="admiproc_sec" id="admiproc">
	<div class="container">
		<h2 class="pgp_com_title">AI and Machine Learning Course Admission Process</h2>
                   
		<div class="d-flex">
			<div class="col-xl-2 col-lg-2 col-md-2 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 lines"></div>
			<div class="col-xl-10 col-lg-10 col-md-10 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 admission_info">
                                				<div class="admission_process_card">
					<div class="mobile_header">
                                                <img width="30" height="30" class="lazyImages" data-src="pgp_new_admission_process_961_1601959519.svg" fullBase="true"  alt="User Image">
						<h3>Enrolment Form</h3>
					</div>
					<img width="60" height="115" class="lazyImages" data-src="pgp_new_admission_process_961_1601959519.svg" fullBase="true"  alt="User Image">
					<div class="card_info">
						<h3>Enrolment Form</h3>
						<p>
                                                    You will be required to provide personal, educational, and professional details. Once we receive your details, our Admissions Counselor will reach out to take your candidature further.                                                </p>
					</div>
				</div>
                                				<div class="admission_process_card">
					<div class="mobile_header">
                                                <img width="30" height="30" class="lazyImages" data-src="pgp_new_admission_process_961_1601959529.svg" fullBase="true"  alt="User Image">
						<h3>Interview and Offer Letter</h3>
					</div>
					<img width="60" height="115" class="lazyImages" data-src="pgp_new_admission_process_961_1601959529.svg" fullBase="true"  alt="User Image">
					<div class="card_info">
						<h3>Interview and Offer Letter</h3>
						<p>
                                                    One-on-one chat with our SME to understand your basic knowledge, prior work experience, and your expectations from this AI certification. After your interview assessment, you will receive an offer letter from us.                                                </p>
					</div>
				</div>
                                				<div class="admission_process_card">
					<div class="mobile_header">
                                                <img width="30" height="30" class="lazyImages" data-src="pgp_new_admission_process_961_1601959544.svg" fullBase="true"  alt="User Image">
						<h3>Payment &amp; Batch Allotment</h3>
					</div>
					<img width="60" height="115" class="lazyImages" data-src="pgp_new_admission_process_961_1601959544.svg" fullBase="true"  alt="User Image">

                		<div class="faq_option_select swiper-container faq-swiper">

                            <div class="faq_accordion_section" id='faq_acc_sec'>
                                                            <div class="accordion faq_accordion faq_accordion_1 show" id="faq-accordion-1">
                                                    <div class="card active">
                                <div class="card-header" id="faq-1-headingOne">
                                    <h3 class="mb-0">
                                    <button class="btn btn-link btn-block text-left " type="button" data-toggle="collapse" data-target="#faq_accordion_1_faq_1" aria-expanded="<?$subIndex==0?'true':'false';?>" aria-controls="faq_accordion_1_faq_1">
                                        What are the objectives of the PG Diploma in AI and Machine Learning courses at Edureka?                                        <span class="icon-down_arrow collapse_arrow"></span>
                                    </button>
                                    </h3>
                                </div>

                                <div id="faq_accordion_1_faq_1" class="faq_collapse collapse show" aria-labelledby="faq-1-headingOne" data-parent="#faq-accordion-1">
                                    <div class="card-body">
                                        <p>By now, everyone knows how and why data is considered as the new gold/fuel. Its application lies in almost all the domains, be it media, HR, finance, gaming, retail, healthcare, or any other industry you can think of.</p>

<p>These PG Diploma Artificial Intelligence Course syllabus at Edureka with NIT Warangal have been designed to cater to multiple domains audiences by exposing problems statements and use cases from different industries. These AI ML certification courses are focused on helping the learners understand and practice the python basics and move towards the intermediate level by training and building machine learning models and gradually advancing to Deep Learning, Natural Language Processing, and Sequence Learning courses.</p>

<p>Learning to code is all about practice with the right guidance and support. So for this, we have multiple in-class demos, question banks, in-class practice questions, and multiple tests and projects so that you can test your learned/practiced skills.</p>

<p>Enrolling with Edureka's PGP AI ML courses will expose you to industrial projects for AI certification from NIT Warangal. You will also get a chance to learn and engage with the industry professionals and work as data scientists/ data engineers/ Machine Learning Engineer for multiple years.</p>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                            </div>
                                                    <div class="card ">
                                <div class="card-header" id="faq-2-headingOne">
                                    <h3 class="mb-0">
                                    <button class="btn btn-link btn-block text-left collapsed" type="button" data-toggle="collapse" data-target="#faq_accordion_1_faq_2" aria-expanded="<?$subIndex==0?'true':'false';?>" aria-controls="faq_accordion_1_faq_2">
                                        What is the average salary of PG Diploma in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning professionals across the world?                                        <span class="icon-down_arrow collapse_arrow"></span>
                                    </button>
                                    </h3>
                                </div>

                                <div id="faq_accordion_1_faq_2" class="faq_collapse collapse " aria-labelledby="faq-2-headingOne" data-parent="#faq-accordion-1">
                                    <div class="card-body">
                                        <p>According to payscale.com, the average salary for an AI and Machine Learning Engineer in India is ₹701,354.</p>


<ul>
<li> An entry-level Machine Learning Engineer (< 1 year) can earn an average total compensation (includes tips, bonus, and overtime pay) of ₹508,845 based on 126 salaries.</li>
<li>An early career Machine Learning Engineer (1-4 years) earns an average of ₹690,687 based on 443 salaries.</li>
<li>A mid-career Machine Learning Engineer (5-9 years) earns an average of ₹1,422,818 based on 97 salaries.</li>
<li>An experienced Machine Learning Engineer (10-19 years) earns an average ₹1,999,859 based on 31 salaries.</li>
</ul>

<p>According to payscale.com, The average salary for an AI and Machine Learning Engineer in US is $112,837.</p>

<ul>
<li>An entry-level Machine Learning Engineer (<1 year) can earn an average of $93,436 based on 251 salaries.</li>
<li>An early career Machine Learning Engineer (1-4 years) earns an average $111,544 based on 1,069 salaries.</li>
<li>A mid-career Machine Learning Engineer (5-9 years )earns an average of $136,991 based on 238 salaries.</li>
<li>An experienced Machine Learning Engineer (10-19 years) earns an average of $149,989 based on 80 salaries.</li>
</ul>

                                    </div>
                                </div>
                            </div>
